job_name: 企劃專員(國中數學)新北
cust_name: 翰林出版事業股份有限公司
job_detail:
★關於翰林
翰林是全國最大的教育出版公司，經營範圍包括幼教、國小、國中、高中職教科書、參考書、試務及線上課程。我們秉持【人，因教育而偉大，因學習而不凡】的理念，陪伴著一代又一代學習者成長築夢。

在翰林，我們提倡進步與成長，勇敢面對挑戰，提供更適性化的教學與學習產品，成就孩子最好的自己。

翰林2022品牌精神影片：
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ClcfZ0iql4U&t=6s

★關於翰林國中企劃
我們正處於最關鍵且最美麗的教學變革年代！

我們正不斷開創、深化關於教育的教科書與符合市場的服務，核心執掌「需求分析、競品分析、行銷策略、文宣波段規劃與推廣、教育訓練、異業合作、網紅合作、活動策辦、數位行銷、品牌定位」，我們著手全新的思維與深度的規劃，讓每位企畫生涯都能因此繽紛發光發熱！

★加入團隊，你將協助我們
1.規劃、推展、執行並管理各項行銷規劃，並協調各單位意見，極大化擴展整體行銷效益  
   你不只是獨當一面的專案負責人，也將成為公司最信任的策略智囊團的一員。
2.從市場第一線洞悉趨勢與需求，與外部單位合作策畫多元異業結盟，
   累積並整合重要資源人脈。
3.跨單位協調意見，在行銷面如同火車頭般，帶動整體策略的運行，及行銷作為的落實。
4.淬鍊你個人對產業及行銷know how的同時，為自己的創意行銷點子注入教育市場，
   我們將提供機會與舞台，成就你的自我實現，成為戰將級的行銷菁英。

★為什麼你選擇加入我們
※除了績效獎金等各項獎金，還有更溫暖的福利，子女獎助金、升學禮品、購書優惠、敬老禮金，以及特別的公司活動、活躍的內部社團，讓你感受一起打拼的美好。

※全面的專業向度，規劃並執行教育行銷的多種機能，你將為數萬名國中老師發揮企劃專業，面臨適度挑戰。

※彈性的工作模式，大多時候能夠自我管理工作進度與時間分配。

※擔任主導橋梁，也能接觸到公司的業務、學校老師、教材編輯、公司的美編以及外部合作單位，我們就是教材跟學校老師意見之間的橋樑。

※充滿無限可能，只要你有想法、有能力，就能從無到有開創翰林尚未出現的制度或價值，不但豐富生涯、精進專業，更會有滿滿的成就感！
other: 有數學或相關教學經驗者佳

你覺得自己設計的課程自己教學驗證是一件很酷的事情！
我們正在尋找上課生動活潑、重視互動的老師，
透過網路帶領學生學習英語文，教授發音、生活對話、文法或閱讀！
公司會提供線上教學方式的完整教育訓練，讓你擴充自己的教學場域！

-歡迎不想到處跑班接課的補習班老師加入！

【品牌資訊】
由OneClass團隊與擁有業界最豐富正版教學資源且歷史悠久的南一書局共同打造─

OneClass真人Live家教誠徵【全職國高中線上教學老師】

**需進中和辦公室授課。

你對教育服務有滿腔熱血，想幫助孩子學得更好？

cust_name: 以賽亞酒具專門店
job_detail:
台灣網路酒器品牌_路西法酒器專門店

我們於2017年開始販售各式酒器，以網路為主要的銷售管道，迅速成為全台灣各大餐廳、酒吧、飯店、酒店的合作廠商，並在2021年在板橋開立第一間門市（展示店，致力供應優質且實用的酒器給台灣消費者。

【應徵條件】
1.無經驗者可
2.對酒品、酒器有興趣者
3.對網路電商有興趣者
4.做事細心且樂於溝通
5.能搬重物者佳
※最重大約10kg,同事會幫忙，也有推車輔助，不經常搬重物
6.工作氛圍較輕鬆，需要有自律的你  


【工作環境】
新北市中和區中山路三段114巷37號1樓
1.有微波爐、小冰箱，可以自己帶便當
2.機車方便不用搶停車位
3.有提供零食區，不定期下午茶


【主要工作內容】

1.倉管(進貨、整理庫存、出&寄貨、盤點、退貨處裡)
※倉庫檢貨、進貨無冷氣較熱(一天大約1小時)
※包貨區有冷氣(一天大約待3小時)
※出貨會拉推車去超商約100m(711、全家)

2.客服回覆
※蝦皮、FB、Google、MOMO客服回覆、公司email回覆

3.退貨處理
客戶退貨處理，與客戶及平台溝通，確認退貨商品正確、是否損壞。

4.進銷存ERP系統處裡
※電腦文書作業，協助倉儲系統Key單

5.主管交辦事務工作
※倉庫、採購業務範圍內



【薪資待遇】
中和地區：28000~31000元+全勤獎金1000元
試用期2個月過後另有包貨獎金
※學習快速調薪速度也很快，不用擔心才能被埋沒！


【工作時間及休假制度】
1.工作時間為09:00-18:00(中午休息時間12:00~13:00)
2.周休2日(見紅就休)
3.平常不用加班，但講求效率！  
※我們重視各位夥伴下班後與朋友家人相處的休息時間！

徵求一名負責日本線電商平台專員
希望您是一位諳日文(日本人佳)及曾有日本電商平台運營經驗的夥伴
包括Amazon、 Rakuten平台運營經驗與後台管理經驗等

* 日本人佳、或曾在日本就學、工作2年以上對日本文化、消費市場有一定程度瞭解
* 希望您是一位重度線上購物的消費者，喜歡變化多端的線上購物市場
歡迎您於應徵時說明您的經驗及想法，以便我們優先處理您的履歷

【工作內容】
1. 日本品牌官網、網購平台Amazon、Rakuten 營運跟後台管理
2. 商品上下架執行、進銷存管理、商品活動提案、活動規劃/追蹤/數據分析、電商營運分析
3. 維護網站頁面、廣告素材、文案內容規劃
4. 日本市場之Google Analytics、IG, Twitter廣告管理, 以及EDM 內容規劃
5. 具備與平台窗口業務溝通協調的自主能力並能協助處理主管交辦事宜
6. 熟悉電子商務之行銷、金流、物流、客服及會員機制運作
language: 日文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通, 中文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等, 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
1. 商務日文必備，中英文擇一可溝通
2. 具有以下一項條件者優先
・網頁設計
・SEO經驗
・有社群廣告經驗
・會使用Illustrator 或是 Photoshop
・會使用社群媒體宣傳工具

cust_name: 親子良品_碩智國際數位整合有限公司
job_detail:
1.喜歡婦幼商品，認同公司理念與產品品牌。認同，才能有正向的工作力。
2.經營社群平台(FB、IG、Youtube、line@..等)，製作吸引受眾點擊的貼文素材和文案。
3.自認是文案魔法師，用最創意、幽默、最吸睛的手法，讓粉絲愛上親子良品！
4.擅長口碑行銷，創造TA話題，季節創造議題於社群平台帶動討論，促進品牌曝光。
5.有網站活動規劃、數據分析經驗，抗壓性高不怕變化、喜歡自我挑戰達成公司目標。
6.有實際 Facebook或Google Adwords 網路廣告投放、分析經驗佳。
7.有企劃與執行直播節目或影音行銷內容經驗優先錄取。
8.協助主管完成交辦事項。


公司經營網站：
iLOVEbaby 親子良品：www.ilovebaby.com.tw

「親子良品」團隊，在找優秀、熱情的你！
我們也許不是最完美的公司，但絕對努力往最好的方向前進。
我們不喜歡加班，只希望你用最有效率的方式達到目標!
如果你也喜歡買，每月員購保證讓你買到爽爽der~
老闆不定期請喝飲料、下午茶、點心，一起聚餐!

學歷、經歷不是我們的主要考量，
如果你正向樂觀、樂於學習、坦誠溝通、態度佳、懂得感恩，
你就是我們要找的團隊人員！歡迎趕快聯絡我們!!

job_name: 總公司_電子商務通路營運副理
cust_name: 車麗屋汽車百貨股份有限公司
job_detail:
【擴大招募】
歡迎對電商有興趣的您加入我們的團隊！擁有全台最大汽車百貨商品！並與各大網路購物平台合作！
需具電商相關經驗3年以上能獨立作業並提出改善方案者。

【工作內容】
1. 管理並經營操作電子商務平台，平台管理與促銷活動規劃提報執行、平台PM業務聯繫、曝光資源爭取。
2. 規劃執行行銷活動等EDM或BANNER，提高公司品牌曝光度並刺激銷售。
3. 虛實通路開發業務拓展，各通路業績設定、數據分析及檢討，負責業績成效及提升。
4. 活動商品評估、行銷及成效追蹤，產品資訊蒐集整理與分析。
5. 與後勤協作進行商品、客服、訂單管理協作維護。
6. 定期與主管做績效檢討，回報客戶問題與進度、找出解決方法並執行。
7. 其他主管交辦事項。
other:
1. 需具電商平台操作經驗者。
2. 具零售、網路平台或業務推廣3年以上相關經驗。
3. 具有檔期活動規畫能力，擅長產品銷售及活動策略操作，能跨部門溝通協調共同執行。
4. 熟悉Office電腦文書處理操作，擅長EXCEL（樞紐分析、Vlookup等）。
5. 細心、認真，對自己的工作負責任。
6. 抗壓力高、有使命感並能獨立思考者。

cust_name: 車麗屋汽車百貨股份有限公司
job_detail:
1. 負責IT資源管理與策略擬定：
（1）管理公司資訊開發專案之進度與流程，包含且不限於前置規劃、流程分析、解決方案評估、系統分析、系統設計、系統開發、資料驗證、系統測試、使用者測試等。
（2）考量內外部使用者之需求，包含且不限於管理階層、使用人員、技術人員、顧客、供應商等不同觀點，以更全面性的思維評估電腦與系統之需求，以提出最適宜之解決方案，協助整體資訊之發展與應用。
（3）負責ERP系統與各部門系統流程規劃、梳理、優化與流程再造。
（4）負責主導公司電子商務系統之規劃、整合與優化。

2. 確保資訊系統之維運為高效且正常：
（1）負責公司之資訊設備與系統順暢運作與維護，分析工作流程，排定作業順序，設立標準值並訂定管理週期。
（2）評估公司對於資訊科技的需求，並提出改善方案（如：軟硬體更新）。
（3）建構資訊系統之資訊安全控管機制，諸如防毒配套、風險控管及損害修復機制等。

3. 有效領導資訊部門，並在公司內部推動數位轉型，以實現高度資訊化治理：
（1）有效管理資訊預算與支出。
（2）指派並監督資訊部門團隊成員工作，以達成公司資訊策略目標及資訊系統正常維運之使命。
（3）領導資訊團隊進行資訊系統之測試與驗證，並檢視系統圖表與程式內容，以利於安裝使用前確認其安全性與適當性。
（4）執行各項資訊系統開發過程中之測試與驗證時，應與其他部門進行有效之溝通協調。
major: 資訊管理相關 資訊工程相關

cust_name: 創穎科技有限公司
job_detail:
工作內容 (此職位需有國外業務相關經驗至少一年以上)：  

1. 維繫現有的客戶關係,擴展合作業務,並收集意見以作市場策劃  
2. 關發具潛力客戶以及有潛力的市場,收集相關資訊並執行市場計劃  
3. 負責產品報價,與客戶洽談訂單、價格以及數量  
4. 需要跟進客戶的訂單  
5. 收集市場資訊,並為為公司規劃市場拓展

發展願景
敝公司主要產品為消費性電子品，包含收音機 藍芽喇叭 藍芽耳機 無線充電等，今年開始發展自有品牌，並期望能把品牌由台灣拓展至海外市場，現在正誠徵有潛力可以成長為獨當一面的人材加入敝公司。 

1. 我們樂意提供較大的發揮空間，讓員工擁有一定的獨立自主性，與客戶來往時可以作一 
     些自主決策 
2. 有機會接觸來自世界各地的海外客戶，擴闊國際視野 
3. 有機會到海外參展，面對面與客戶商談業務 
4. 有機會為產品的開發提供意見 
5. 有機會到海外出差，直接與當地的客戶商談業務 
6. 提供業務人員的專業訓練，可以藉此學習消費性電子產品的國際貿易知識 
7. 如能力受到肯定，有機會訓練新人，並領導他開拓市場業務 

最後，本公司的宗旨之一是提供平台於人材發揮並發展，我們正急速擴展，亦願意提供機會予各式各樣的人材，讓他們成長並發揮自己的才能，是一間有活力，能提供向上發展空間的公司

成就樂趣
本公司為外商公司 薪資福利佳 並依工作績效及表現提供獎金 

年薪13個月

荃贏全美成立於2014年，目前是全台唯一專注於腸道健康的保健品牌，提供腸道保健完整解決方案，致力於守護國人的腸道健康。
８年來秉持著「有效有體感」， 「天然無藥更健康」 ， 「平價親民」的三大原則 ，陸續推出【膳食纖維】【益生菌】【酵素】等腸道相關保健食品，之中的神纖子系列及獨家配方，解決無數人排便困擾。

荃贏全美在疫情當下成績不降反增，會員人數突破10萬人，粉絲專頁超過6萬人追蹤，google商家網友使用好評超過600則，FB用戶好評超過3000則，數十位網紅愛用推薦，並且在2020年google腸道保健食品關鍵字搜尋第一。

如果你想透過自己的跨境電商能力，把商品推向世界各個角落，跟我們一起打造腸道保健第一的品牌。
歡迎加入我們，一展長才，並且成為第一。

job_detail:
行政助理
1. 負責一般文書資料處理及歸檔工作。

3. 協助處理庶務性行政工作（如：事務機器叫修維護、文具用品採買）。
4. 收發公文並處理會簽文件。

7. 負責外出送件、物件寄送及簡易銀行業務處理。
8. 負責接待訪客、準備會議室及茶水。
9. 支援其他部門業務（如：採購、倉庫）。
10. 負責辦公室環境與設備之清潔與維護。




記帳／出納
1. 辦理銀行現金存款、提款、匯款、轉帳作業。
2. 執行一般現金收付作業。
3. 核對儲存現金與記錄是否相符合。
4. 管理零用金異動及撥補作業。
5. 製作出納科目餘額表、收款日報表、利息收入調節表、銀行存款收支日報表、銀行往來授信明細表等。
6. 完成例行付款開票及電子支付作業。
7. 收發、記錄及彙整交易產生之原始憑證 ，並登錄至會計系統製作傳票。
8. 整理有關各項費用支付之發票、單據及帳務處理。
9. 整理廠商貨款或費用等應付款項帳務。
10. 整理客戶應收款項帳務。
11. 處理其他一般會計帳務。
12. 申報營業稅、營所稅等各項稅務。
13. 總分類帳及帳冊記錄及憑證之登載、核算及保管。
14. 負責公司外帳之查核及登帳、結帳整理及稅務申報。
15. 配合財報需要，備妥查帳準備資料。
16. 定期編製帳務報表及其他財務分析資料。

job_name: 國外業務助理(實習業務)
cust_name: 創穎科技有限公司
job_detail:
工作內容：  

1. 各式表單繕打及整理歸檔  
2. 協助跟單業務處理訂單相關事項及工廠對口聯繫
3. 協助開發業務整理客戶資料 市場訊息及發產品推廣信  
4. 協助發報價單  
5. 產品資料整理  
6. 工作熟系及學程後,轉業務獨立運作, 順利的話半年就可能轉業務

發展願景
敝公司主要產品為消費性電子品，包含收音機 藍芽喇叭 藍芽耳機 無線充電等，今年開始發展自有品牌，並期望能把品牌由台灣拓展至海外市場，現在正誠徵有潛力可以成長為獨當一面的人材加入敝公司。 

1. 我們樂意提供較大的發揮空間，讓員工擁有一定的獨立自主性，與客戶來往時可以作一 
     些自主決策 
2. 有機會接觸來自世界各地的海外客戶，擴闊國際視野 
3. 有機會到海外參展，面對面與客戶商談業務 
4. 有機會為產品的開發提供意見 
5. 有機會到海外出差，直接與當地的客戶商談業務 
6. 提供業務人員的專業訓練，可以藉此學習消費性電子產品的國際貿易知識 
7. 如能力受到肯定，有機會訓練新人，並領導他開拓市場業務 

最後，本公司的宗旨之一是提供平台於人材發揮並發展，我們正急速擴展，亦願意提供機會予各式各樣的人材，讓他們成長並發揮自己的才能，是一間有活力，能提供向上發展空間的公司

成就樂趣
本公司為外商公司 薪資福利佳 並依工作績效及表現提供獎金 

年薪13個月

cust_name: 銳思有限公司
job_detail:
TAIGER 以潮流設計，為「健人」們打造運動服飾和周邊商品。我們對視覺美感和產品質量極度要求，因此能夠在台灣健身圈中有獨特的吸引力。

我們看待客服職位與傳統客服的定位不同。傳統客服人員時常受到客戶不專業的對待，但是在 TAIGER，你會被培訓成一位排解問題的高手，並以專業且舉一反三的方式為客戶排解問題，因此客戶也會拿出專業的態度尋求你的協助。

身為客 TAIGER 團隊的一員，我們希望你邏輯清晰，反應靈活，高 EQ ，能妥善回應客戶並協助解決問題。也希望你願意耐心傾聽用戶心聲，蒐集歸納並反饋給產品團隊作為產品優化的建議。

你不是傳統客服、商品銷售人員，而是全公司最了解客戶與產品，且代表公司站在第一線和客戶溝通的重要人員。  我們也期待你能透過這份工作累積產品、業務、行銷等多元的專業能力，你不一定要有相關經驗，但合適的人格特質會讓你更有機會成為一名非常優秀的夥伴！還能為TAIGER圈粉～

- 


 【工作內容】 
1. 透過電話、郵件、線上文字客服，處理客戶諮詢並提供合適的解決方案。
 2. 收集並重現客戶的問題情境與步驟，協助開發團隊迅速理解並解決問題。
 3. 與客戶建立良好溝通管道，統整、分析客戶潛在需求，提供開發團隊產品或服務改善建議。
4. 即時反應顧客問題，持續優化客戶服務流程。
5. 客人商品退換貨處理。
6. 擔任倉庫窗口：出入倉行程預約，庫存控管 ，紀錄銷售報表。
7. 每月新品上架
8. 處理辦公室行政事務，辦公室零用金控管，每月出口訂單報表彙整。
9. 總部試穿服務接待



【職務要求】 

1. 具備耐心及親和力，富有熱忱，不怕生，主動探詢客戶需求，幫助他們解決各項疑難雜症。
 2. 邏輯清晰、具判斷能力，能快速釐清客戶問題並提供專業諮詢服務。

 3. 高EQ，善於傾聽與溝通，能妥善處理衝突並化危機為轉機。

 4. 擅於溝通協調，能融洽地與團隊進行配合協作。

 5. 適應力強，擁抱變化，心態開放，熱愛學習，具備成長思維。  

【加分條件】
 1. 線上客服相關經驗1-2年經驗。
 2. 對新創公司、健身服飾產業充滿憧憬與熱情。
3. 平時有健身運動的習慣。

job_name: 產品管理師 (工業/車用/醫療)
cust_name: 佳必琪國際股份有限公司
job_detail:
符合其一項產業相關經驗即可 (工業/車用/新能源/醫療)

工業/車用/新能源/醫療產品規劃與管理 
1.負責產品規劃與管理，制定產品規格、用料 & 加工方式，提出成本分析與產品毛利建議。 
2.主導與研發人員進行產品開發溝通與可行性評估，確認產品功能、規格與品質。 
3.進行產品開發管理，確保Time to Market的初期送樣時程。 
4.制定產品開發投資預算，追蹤後續投資費用相關，以及預估產品銷售收入規模。
5.管理產品生命週期，發展與維護該產品Roadmap。 
6.負責蒐集與分析競爭者產品相關資料。 
7.協助專案PM推動該產品專案之執行、管理、問題追蹤及解決，完成產品設計/驗證/試樣/量產等時程之管控。 
8.尋求外部資源來增補內部資源之不足，加強產品銷售競爭。 
9.負責工業/車用/新能源/醫療連接器與線束市場調查相關資訊。

工業/車用/新能源/醫療產品推廣 
1.推廣新產品，進行新產品發表會議，定期對業務進行產品推廣教育訓練，吸引業務投入更多資源銷售該系列產品。 
2.掌管與處理該產品之客戶專案，評估確認客戶產品技術規格需求，提供解決方案協助業務回覆RFI/RFQ。 
3.協助業務拜訪客戶，產品介紹與銷售推廣，討論產品規格與製作開發，提出解決客製化需求之設變提案。
4.溝通協調與整合各部門參與開發與量產相關事宜，排除產品開發與量產製造遭遇之所有困難。 

工業/車用/新能源/醫療產品成本管理
1.主導控管產品成本預算，追蹤產品毛利狀況，業績HIT Rate狀況
2.根據產品銷售狀況，主動召開內部產品說明會，依市場現況去更新產品出廠價格，以符合市場與客戶之需求。

job_name: 【電商】保健品產品開發企劃 (捷運2分鐘)
cust_name: 荃贏全美密碼有限公司
job_detail:
--工作內容--
產品開發企劃/產品PM
● 針對新/舊品，提出具市場優勢差異賣點的產品開發企劃與執行
● 產品配方設計(含新/舊品)、成本把控
● 產品生產流程規劃及管理、代工廠進度掌握
● 蒐集外部資訊(市場資訊、競品資訊、消費者資訊分析等)
● 產品銷售輔助(輔銷物、教育訓練、產品溝通等)

--薪資福利--
★ 薪資底薪：41800-47200 (另有團隊獎金)
★ 年終獎金：保障１個月基本薪資
★ 其它獎金：端午禮券、中秋禮券、生日禮券
★ 員工旅遊：旅遊津貼補助
★ 員購優惠：6 折優惠
★ 員工健檢：每年 1 次

--公司簡介--

★ 公司名稱：荃贏全美密碼有限公司
★ 公司網址：https://www.allwealth.com.tw/
★ 粉絲專頁：https://www.facebook.com/allwealth.tw
★ 上班時段：週㇐～週五／白天／08:30~17:30
★ 休假時段：週休二日／按國定假日休

荃贏全美成立於2014年，目前是全台唯一專注於腸道健康的保健品牌，提供腸道保健完整解決方案，致力於守護國人的腸道健康。
８年來秉持著「有效有體感」， 「天然無藥更健康」 ， 「平價親民」的三大原則 ，陸續推出【膳食纖維】【益生菌】【酵素】等腸道相關保健食品，之中的神纖子系列及獨家配方，解決無數人排便困擾。

荃贏全美在疫情當下成績不降反增，會員人數突破10萬人，粉絲專頁超過6萬人追蹤，google商家網友使用好評超過1000則，FB用戶好評超過3000則，數十位網紅愛用推薦，並且在2021年google腸道保健食品關鍵字搜尋第一。

如果你想透過自己的產品開發能力，把商品推向世界各個角落，跟我們一起打造腸道保健第一的品牌。
歡迎加入我們，一展長才，並且成為第一。

job_name: 視覺設計師 @ 精品咖啡品牌
cust_name: 智豆科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
僅限以下連結投遞履歷，不接受 104 履歷投遞   
https://buon.teamdoor.io/s/HTYQYiwn

【 公司介紹 】

我們是智豆科技 - 步昂咖啡，我們希望改變咖啡產業，並堅信我們的使命「讓精品咖啡普及化」。我們是賣咖啡的公司，但我們不像其他咖啡公司，因為我們除了是賣咖啡的公司，更是一間科技公司！   

 ▍我們的品牌路線   ▍ 
台灣最新鮮：官網保證烘焙 24 小時內出貨。
科技烘焙・品質絕對：以「高科技自動化」烘焙，取代「高人工成本」烘焙，致力於高效達成兼顧「穩定品質」與「親民價格」的精品咖啡！ 
自由品味・輕鬆享受：我們認為精品咖啡可以專業、但應該不要艱澀；我們認為精品咖啡可以高級、但應該少些高冷，在精品咖啡普及化的浪潮中，步昂希望帶著所有人都能「輕鬆享受精品咖啡」的思維，成為大家的精品咖啡最佳領航員 (握拳)  ！


▍工作內容  ▍
 負責台灣精品咖啡電商領導品牌 ( 步昂咖啡 ) 之「品牌識別與視覺設計 」
 其中包含但不限於：商品攝影、平面設計、影片拍攝與後製、包裝設計等 
 數位行銷企劃、社群媒體渠道及廣告等素材的視覺設計。打造與強化品牌視覺一致性！
 依照檔期活動、包裝改版等議題，進行視覺包裝與設計
 持續吸收設計趨勢，結合商業需求設計素材，並利用數據表現分析優化設計

我們是新創公司，大家都需要接觸不同事情與技能 ( 但不離視覺、行銷與咖啡的領域 )；有人認為這是公司要求過多 、有人認為充滿熱情與挑戰，我們希望你是後者。因此這樣之下，我們不會要求您上述全部技能滿點，但期待您帶著喜愛精品咖啡、一起學習成長的心，和我們一同建立有質感的精品咖啡品牌。
--
我們是成立約不到五年的新創公司，過去我們靠著「對的電商策略」與「明確定位」有了一波非常可觀的成長。而因業績的增加、隨之而來的工作量，開始讓我們同仁無法再專注於成長策略，因此需要另行邀請優秀人才的加入，一起創造接下來更高速的成長。 
我們相信你是優秀且適合我們的人才 這是我們邀請你加入我們的原因 我們也努力讓公司充滿的這樣的人才  
--
我們是新創公司，我們認為一份工作做大做小，主要取決於同仁對自己的期待：可以簡單盡基本責任、也可以用心做到好、讓公司與自己同時得到成長。而我們希望您是後者、讓公司與您一同成長。
我們知道有競爭力的待遇是爭取人才的要素，但我們更知道打造舒服的工作環境、愉悅的同事關係與良好的公司文化，是留住人才與打造公司競爭力更重要的關鍵。
--
承上，我們是成立不到五年的精品咖啡熟豆電商，過往設計多以外包方式執行，但隨著我們的成長、且深知品牌識別對於品牌長遠的影響，因此希望尋找和我們一樣喜歡精品咖啡、一起透過視覺讓咖啡品牌更上層樓的熱情伙伴！

雖然我們目前還沒有內部設計專業同仁，但我們重視設計，因此前陣子也努力製作了初版的 Design Guideline https://bit.ly/3SN67qq ，我們知道這部分還略有陽春，所以我們熱烈的期待與你一起把這做的更好、一起讓步昂咖啡打造為「有質感」的精品咖啡品牌！

【 團隊 】
我們目前約是 15 人的團隊，平均年齡不到 30 歲；我們有來自網路新創公司的產品經理、有台灣精品咖啡賽評審、也有曾經在知名連鎖咖啡店的年輕吧台手與烘焙師。
因為團隊還不大，所以大家相處融洽，會互相幫忙、更會互相要求。工作上，我們是有話直說的團隊、歡迎你有不同的想法。

➜➜  科學烘豆團隊  https://www.buoncaffe.com.tw/pages/roasters 
➜➜  工作同仁的心得分享  https://www.facebook.com/BuonCaffeTW/posts/pfbid0ycRdds2EwQJidJwMGT5fgw7emNKDLZ4bFKFXwqj7wZLsfZZhndNxjNfQUmRyarKdl 



【公司福利】

▍照顧你的味蕾 ▍  
精品咖啡：各式咖啡器材、喝不完的精品咖啡 ☕️  
精品咖啡：完整精品咖啡教學 
零食：每月辦公室零食金、買什麼自己決定 
▍鼓勵公司和個人一起成長 ▍  
年終：年終 1 個月 
成長：補助相關課程、書籍或演講補助，期待你與公司一起成長  
▍其他我們也覺得應該有的 ▍  
設備：標配 24 吋雙螢幕、讓你工作舒服又效率 
生病好休息：全職同仁另有全薪病假 1 年 3 天  (法規為半薪)
保障：除基本勞健退外，全職同仁另有公司團保意外險 
我們不一定能給你最優渥的福利，但我們可以給你發揮的舞台
我們不一定有最完善的制度，但我們期待和你一起建立制度
我們不是一間完美的公司，但我們希望和你一起解決問題
我們是一間新創公司，我們等待不怕把手弄髒的你！
＊若自認能力超出薪資範圍，可另外面議
skill: 視覺設計相關知識, 電腦繪圖軟體操作, 繪圖工具與軟體操作
other:
【必備條件】
 熟悉 Adobe Photoshop、Adobe Illustrator
 喜歡「攝影、影片拍攝」工作或有相關經驗

--

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
<Summary>
Our Financial Analyst will primarily be responsible for the timely and accurate month end closing, financial reporting and daily assignment. As part of Revenue team, this person will execute monthly close activities, financial report, flux analysis, as well as the daily assignments such as revenue testing. An ideal candidate will have a Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting or Finance, possess working knowledge of U.S. GAAP or TW EAS, and pay attention to detail. The ideal candidate will be a hands-on team player possessing solid organizational and communication skills.

<Essential Duties and Responsibilities>
The responsibilities will include, but not limited to:
1. Meet monthly closing timeline to complete the regional financial statement.
2. Foster a proactive approach for financial statement accuracy and accounts reconciliation quality.
3. Ensure revenue recognized appropriately and the required reconciliation is completed on time.
4. Proactively understand the upstream process and provide guidance to avoid revenue recognition risks. 
5. Proactively sense and point out the revenue recognition risks and get it clarified. 
6. Ensure revenue recognized appropriately in compliance with related regulations.
7. Analyze B/S and P/L as well as management report.
8. Be responsible for Internal & External Audit preparation. 
9. Ad Hoc project assigned.

<Qualifications>
1. Bachelor degree or above 
2. At least 4 years relevant accounting experience or 2 years Big 4 Accounting Firm experience. 
3. Excellent MS office, especially Excel. 
4. Excellent communication skills. 
5. ERP experience is a must, SAP preferred. 
6. Fluent in writing and speaking English. 
7. Proactive, mature, detail oriented, willing to work with deadline.

job_name: 中和環球專櫃人員-『月薪40K~55K』★適用安穩僱用獎勵-最高可領20,000元★
cust_name: AIR SPACE_新地國際股份有限公司
job_detail:
【獎勵津貼內容】
符合政府安穩僱用計畫資格者，可獲得勞動部就業獎勵，錄取時將由專人為您服務。
獎勵辦法：經錄取並報到者，到職滿2個月及4個月分別可請領10,000元獎勵津貼
 (共20,000元)。需符合就服站申請作業流程。
專案內容可參考：https://special.taiwanjobs.gov.tw/internet/2021/hirepayNew/page-01.html

喜愛服飾穿搭，願累積銷售經驗及主動服務顧客
對職涯未來有企圖心、渴望晉升機會
具有以上任一想法以及希望付諸於行動的你
歡迎加入AIR SPACE團隊!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
【工作內容】
1.提供客戶商品介紹、銷售與服務。
2.協助門市形象佈置、商品陳列、庫存管理。
3.客戶關懷維護。
4.門市店務經營、推動店業績目標達成與相關行政作業。
5.須配合門市輪調與支援。
★投遞履歷時請提供個人IG或FB帳號

【多元獎金制度，銷售更有目標】
1.重視團隊精神，沒有惡性競爭的個績制度，創造良好合作的工作氛圍。
2.具競爭力的薪酬制度 (門市團績抽成、績效獎金、多元專案競賽獎金…等)
3.年終績效獎金（適個人年度績效考核）及門市人員推薦獎金。
4.提供具市場競爭薪資水平:
   ★門市人員:月均薪每月4萬至5.5萬以上。
  ★儲備店長:月均薪每月5萬至6.6萬以上。

【教育資源與順暢升遷管道】
1.新人職前訓練、共通職能培訓、專業職能培訓、管理職能培訓…等。
2.豐富的教育訓練課程 (內訓、外訓)。
3.完整升遷考核制度 (升遷考核、每半年/年度考核)。

【法定福利】
1.勞保、健保。
2.勞退金 6%足額提撥。
3.團體保險，上/下班、在家都安心。
4.法定傳染病防疫保障。

【休閒福利】
1.旅遊補助。
2.部門不定期聚餐。
3.年度春酒。

【其他福利】
1.員工購物優惠。
2.三節禮金或禮品。
3.夜間津貼。


[敬請留意事項如下]
1.若報到日期非當月1號，薪資會依照比例計算。
2.此職務須配合門市輪調。
3.本職缺為排班排休制，因此若只能上平日或白天班，很抱歉請勿投遞。
4.服務業須久站及走動，請先評估個人體力是否可接受。
5.約定面試後無故未到，則向104人力銀行提報失約名單，恕無提供再次安排。

荃贏全美成立於2014年，目前是全台唯一專注於腸道健康的保健品牌，提供腸道保健完整解決方案，致力於守護國人的腸道健康。

荃贏全美在疫情當下成績不降反增，會員人數突破10萬人，粉絲專頁超過6萬人追蹤，google商家網友使用好評超過900則，FB用戶好評超過3000則，數十位網紅愛用推薦，並且在2022年google腸道保健食品關鍵字搜尋第一。

Overview: 

Be part of the driver for our fast growing myViewBoard ecosystem, you will be responsible for the full spectrum of the business management, go-to-market marketing campaign, and business strategies management

Job description

•	Modelling business processes for data monetization potential (myViewBoard Insights) and identifying opportunities for process improvements.
•	Creating functional specifications for myViewBoard Insights.
•	Implementing and testing of proposed functional specification on myViewBoard Insights.
•	Analyze business and user behavioral data and deliver insights on potential areas of growth, optimization, and improvements
•	Support business intelligence strategies with quantitative analysis
•	Work cross-departmentally on data-driven strategies that improve business processes and decision-making
•	Simplifying information and deciphering data science technical jargon so it is easily understood by stakeholders
•	Data-driven marketing (MarTech) mindset, able to collect, analyze, and turn data performance into practical business proposals

Support overseas sales teams to make orders to be booked as revenue, including order entry, credit control, shipment arrangement, coordinating with customers/overseas office, shipping documents preparation, process payment request, documents filing to comply with internal/external audit.

(1) Pre-check cargo measurement and goods availability once the demand is raised up by NS sales and confirm with both sales and customers for order details, and make internal allocation booking for cargo reservation at the same time

(2) Generate PI for customers for confirmation, and to get customer's forwarder information for shipments arrangement

(3) Resolve to order process-related problems with related depts.

(4) Issue shipping instruction to related parties (warehouses, customers assigned forwarder) for shipments arrangement and inform the customer shipping schedule once it's confirmed

(5) Inform and provide related information for the warehouse to prepare rework and follow through progress till ETD.

(6) Prepare all necessary documents including customers to request documents, forwarder and vessel lines request documents, and export documents, any kind of COO…etc.

(7) To exercise Pick Release & Ship Confirm at oracle system for PI closing after the shipment is dispatched

(8) Generate related sales report to remind NS sales about all the pending issues then follow through till PI is closed as revenue or canceled.

(9) To check up a bill of each shipment, and classify all the expenses into account per finance request, then make payment application and monthly sales report

(10) Documents filing / Collect expenses to accounting; marketing materials/sample/customer service buffer unit etc shipment arrangement.

(11) Response to customer/sales about freight cost inquiries

(12) Response to sales for shipment related inquiries

(13) Complete other assigned tasks and jobs

job_name: 勞工健康服務護理人員(職護)(中和)-TC220205
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
職務說明：
勞工健康服務護理人員(職護)負責員工健康專案管理，以及疾病和傷害預防、與防止和工作相關的危險。職責應依職業安全衛生法執行，包括但不限於。
This Occupational Health nurse will be focused on the promotion of health, as well as the prevention of illness and injury and protection from work-related hazards.
The duties shall execute according to Occupational Safety and Health Act included not limited.


工作內容：
1.	執行、跟蹤、審查和監控員工年度體檢。
2.	健康檢查結果分析評估、健康管理與保存。
3.	評估職業傷害，對職業健康相關的員工進行評估和個案管理。
4.	根據《職業安全法》的要求，規劃並實施勞動身心健康安全保護、人因危害預防、孕產婦健康保護、健康教育、指導與促進等。
5.	協助進行職業傷害預防、健康諮詢、緊急處理。
6.	執行醫療防疫備品採購與庫存管理。
7.	協調醫療緊急應變、培訓並為員工提供急救處置。
8.	協助辦公室和行政職能。

1.	Performs, tracks, reviews, and monitors employees’ annual physical exams.
2.	Analysis and assessment of colleagues’ health check results, health management and illness preservation.
3.	Evaluates occupational injuries and perform an assessment of occupational health-related high-risk workers and case management.
4.	Plans and implements labor physical and mentally healthy and safety protection, ergonomic issues, maternal health protection, labor health education, health guidance…etc., per Occupational Safety Law requirements.
5.	Assists with occupational injuries prevention, health advice, and emergency treatment.
6.	Keep inventory and resupplies medical supplies.
7.	Coordinates medical emergency response, and training and provide first aid to employees.
8.	Performs and support office and administration function.


資格：
1.	需具備「護理師證照」。
2.	具「勞工健康服務護理人員訓練合格(結業)證書」(受訓52小時合格)亦可於面試時提供參考。
3.	於企業擔任職護經驗3年以上者為佳。

1.	Registered nurse license is a must.
2.	Completed Occupational Labor Health Service Nursing training and has an Occupational health nurse license.
3.	Three years of relevant experience at least.
language: 英文:聽 /略懂、說 /略懂、讀 /略懂、寫 /略懂

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Supermicro Taiwan is seeking Software Design Engineers for their Zhonghe（中和）/TaoYuan Bade （桃園八德）office.
The web frontend UI/UX design for Super Cloud Composer/ Management software /Cloud Management.

• Clearly articulate the web/app design vision and then collaborate closely with product owners and team members to ideate new products and features.
• Conceptualize requirements and ideas; compile and illustrate design artifacts (personas, storyboards,functional maps, user flows, wireframes, Mockups, prototypes, annotated design documents and spec).
• Understand user-centered design considerations. Iterate on designs rapidly, based on feedback from users and stakeholders.
• Work across projects and design interaction framework that applies consistent patterns across a variety of use cases. Work within existing style guidelines and create a consistent look that aligns with company brand.
• Communicate design intent to PM and engineering, testing partners. Collaborate closely with team members to ensure creative styles are within technical constraints.
• Follow-up with engineers and scrum to iterate the product
other:
• Minimum 3+ years of full-time experience as a UI/UX designer with the strong portfolio in web or app.
• Expert-level proficiency in design tools such as wire-framing tools, Photoshop, Illustrator, ideally have experience working on Figma design system, Hands-on experience creating user flows, storyboards, wireframes, prototypes, etc.
• Deep understanding of responsive design, RWD first.
• Understand the brief with logical and work with details to deliver the right and clear designs
• Real passion for our craft: design, creativity, technology; Be open to receiving objective criticism and improving upon it.
• Strong verbal, written, visual communication and presentation skills in English.
• Experience working in an agile/scrum development process.
• Have server domain knowledge is better.
• Basic HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript skills are a plus.

job_name: 專案管理(數位轉型/企業流程改善)
cust_name: 文曄集團_文曄科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
文曄提供良好的發展舞台，可以接觸公司最重要的數位轉型(Digital transformation)專案，歡迎對企業流程改善有熱忱的你們加入！

【工作內容】 
1. 參與企業內部作業流程整合/規劃/設計(Ex. 採購、銷售、倉儲、管理、數據分析等)，協助專案管理與執行。
2. 原廠/客戶的客製專案規劃及設計
3. 配合流程再造，參與系統作業的規格設計，與需求單位、IT部門協調溝通。 
4. 協助專案/系統上線前教育訓練
>具備採購、銷售、供應鏈管理相關背景或相關工作經驗，在文曄可以活化您的供應鏈專業，並透過專案管理的手法來應用實現!
>具備程式撰寫專業，在文曄可以接觸到前端的需求訪談及專案規畫，並可與IT團隊協同合作，將您的設計付諸實現!

【應徵資格】 
1. 大學以上，資訊/工工/工管/供應鏈管理相關科系畢業尤佳。 
2. 具3年以上電子業相關經驗尤佳(Ex. 代理商, IC 原廠, 半導體, 電子製造...等)。 
3. 英文能力佳 (Toeic 550分以上) 
4. 具採購、銷售、供應鏈管理相關背景或相關工作經驗尤佳。 
5. 具企業營運改善專案管理經驗尤佳。

【文曄簡介】
文曄集團為亞太第2大、全球第4大半導體元件代理商，為台灣的上市公司(股票代碼3036)，營收穩定成長，並致力於國際化發展，營運據點目前為45個，遍及亞洲主要國家。
我們代理全球超過60家一流半導體原廠，服務優質客戶超過9,000家，所經銷代理的產品線涵蓋主機板、筆記型電腦、通訊網路、影像產品、工業控制、車用電子、物聯網(IoT)、消費電子零件等高科技產品。不僅是代理產品，優質的技術Total Solution及迅速的服務團隊更完整地提供客戶全方位的資訊。

cust_name: 松霖工程顧問股份有限公司
job_detail:
工作說明:
1. 收發、記錄及彙整交易產生之原始憑證，並登錄至會計系統製作傳票。
2. 審核有關各項費用支付之發票、單據及帳務處理。
3. 處理廠商貨款或費用等應付款項帳務。
4. 處理客戶應收款項帳務。
5. 處理其他一般會計帳務。
6. 申報營業稅、營所稅等各項稅務及協助公司稅務及會計師事務所窗口。
7. 負責總分類帳及帳冊記錄及憑證之登載、核算及保管。
8. 協助辦理公司工商登記及每年公會續辦事宜。
9. 協助辦理銀行現金存、提款、匯款轉帳。
10. 協助執行一般現金收付作業。
11. 核對儲存現金與記錄是否相符合。
12. 協助管理零用金異動及撥補作業。
13. 協助製作出納科目餘額表、收款日報表、利息收入調節表、銀行存款收支日報表、銀行往來授信明細表等。
14. 協助工程估價單key印及工程合約印製。
15. 協助完成例行收款開立票及電子支付作業。
16. 協助簡易出納會計事務及銀行往來。
17.協助公司稅務及會計師事務所窗口。

公司客戶績效：
本公司是一家工程顧問公司,其主要客戶為長庚醫院,上市高科技公司廠房,微星科技,台聚集團,慈濟基金會,綸盛企業(gogoro),台灣固網,林業試驗所,國防大學,空軍司令部,各級學校新(擴建)建大樓,廠房,資訊機房等。營業項目內容:規劃,設計,施工,維護。
 
公司核心價值:安全,品質,創新,共享,服務 

公司願景:滿足客戶,與客戶達到雙贏;公司利潤與員工分享;提升傳產機電產業競爭力。

員工培訓計畫:
 1.採用德日師徒制,建立高價值專業人才及高素質技術人員.
 2.由年輕專業技師作公司人才訓練新人才改造計畫.
 3.送員培訓專業技術證照.(考取後由公司提供獎勵金及租賃費)
 4.送員至專業學校短期或長期在職進修.
 5.優秀員工提供升遷培訓計畫.

公司發展：
松霖工程顧問渴望讓世界看見台灣營造工程的卓越水準，我們秉持安全、服務、品質及共享4大核心價值，協助國內提升營造及電力工程產業。

成就/樂趣：
本公司榮獲民國105年第17屆傑出企業金峰獎的殊榮
major: 商業及管理學科類
other:
工作技能：
具備金融專業知識與分析

We are seeking a Technical Writer/Graphics Designer who is able to create and maintain motherboard and product-related technical documentations. The potential candidate will need to use the Adobe CS platform and MadCap Flare to write, revise, and create illustration drawings for technical documentations, including user’s manuals, quick reference guides, and user’s guides. Also, the potential candidate will need to have the ability to handle multilingual documents. Plus, the ability of English-Chinese translations is required.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities: 
1. Support writer teams in technical documentations
2. Work closely with and provide support to PMs, engineers, and other technical writers to meet the deadline and ensure quality
3. Create and maintain illustration drawings
4. Follow superiors’ instructions and perform teamwork
5. Submit work reports for review and keep records of document revisions

	Assisting in managing the company products and other details of sales and service requests for providing the same to the customers for technical support

	Preparing relevant records, data, and documents for product presentations, conducting training sessions for demonstrating new products and services, and supporting the sales team in organizing the presentation and training of product demonstration
	Coordinating with the sales and marketing team, systems application team, and other executive designers for designing proper application system, and formulating the product specification as per the customer's needs
	Monitoring and managing the preamp devices for systems application and implementing innovative ways to optimize the use of wireless network for effective communication
	Coordinating with the project management team for overall analysis of health care applications and home energy procedures for system installation
	Providing capacitive resolution for all the installed application and assisting customers in maintaining the engineering applications efficiently
	Evaluating the customer's requirement regarding systems application and administering the technical, technological, and functional aspects of proposals accordingly as instructed
	Assisting the application engineering manager for performing the desired tests and installation procedures, preparing detailed schedule regarding the project specification, conducting research on market trends in field application, and analyzing the emerging trends for recommending the new application engineering products
	Providing technical training of consumer specific application of various application engineering products in developing stage to the branch personnel for adequate management of the same

job_name: 【研發替代役】BMC Firmware Engineer BMC韌體工程師-中和/八德
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Hi, welcome to join us. 
We have training courses for newcomers to understand BMC's world.
The nice work atmosphere on our team and good communication with supervisors/colleagues.
You will also have capabilities learned and contributed to our team.
1. Coding skills
2. Communication skills with teams.
3. Join the spec discussion.
4. English writing/speaking skills.
5. Teamwork experiences
• Responsible for designing, debugging, developing, testing, and maintaining BMC/IPMI-related software and firmware for Server Systems.
• Work closely with the software and hardware teams to develop and integrate embedded code.
• develop RESTful API, web interface, SNMP, HTML5, iKVM, Virtual Media, and other remote access interfaces.
• Responsible for platform hardware controlling and monitoring e.g motherboard, backplane, M.2, U.2, NVME, HDD, SAS controller, LAN add-on card, OCP card, and other components management.
• The candidate must be motivated and thrive in a fast-paced and team-oriented environment.

您好，歡迎加入美超微，我們有BMC相關的培訓課程，讓你可以更快速了解 BMC 的世界喔！
這裡工作氛圍好，主管/同事間的溝通也很良好，在這裡你可以培養以下技能：
1. 編碼技巧
2. 團隊的溝通技巧。
3. 規格書的擬訂。
4. 英語寫作/口語能力。
5. 團隊合作力

我們主要負責：
1. 伺服器系統設計、除錯、開發、測試和維護與BMC/IPMI 相關的軟硬體。
2. 與軟硬體團隊密切合作，開發和整合嵌入式程式代碼。
3. 開發RESTful API、Web 界面、SNMP、HTML5、iKVM、Virtual Media 和其他遠程訪問界面。
4. 負責平台硬體的控制和監控，如主板、背板、M.2、U.2、NVME、HDD、SAS控制器、LAN附加卡、OCP卡等元件管理。
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
Satisfy one of the conditions is MUST, more are plus+.
1. Master's degree (CS, EE or other engineering degrees) with 2+ years of industry experience
2. Bachelor's degree (CS, EE or other engineering degrees) with 3+ years of industry experience
3. Specialize in the following industry skills or products.
•  Familiar with one or more of the Languages, C / C++ / Script / Python
•  RTOS, or Embedded Linux development for Uboot, Kernel, drivers, and Filesystem.
•  Industry protocols: IPMI, Redfish, SNMP, I2C, SPI, PMBUS, KCS, RGMII, HTTPS, MCTP, PCIe, USB, NVME-MI, JSON, XML...
•  OpenBMC experience.
須具備以下其中一個條件，若具備多項則更加分：
1. 碩士（CS、EE或其他工程學位），2年以上行業經驗
2. 本科學歷（CS、EE或其他工程學位），3年以上行業經驗
3. 專攻以下行業技能或產品。
• 熟悉一種或多種語言，C / C++ / Script / Python
• 碰過RTOS或是嵌入式系統，熟悉Uboot、kernel、Driver等 
• 熟稔工業標準：IPMI、Redfish、SNMP、I2C、SPI、PMBUS、KCS、RGMII、HTTPS、MCTP、PCIe、USB、NVME-MI、JSON、XML...
• OpenBMC的相關經驗。

OEM Program manager is responsible for delivering great customer engagement and satisfaction. The idea candidate will coordinate and manage all internal procurement, production, engineering, and shipping activities to fulfill customer demands. The OEM Program manager must be able to communicate the operational requirements and topics, and resolve related obstacles with external and internal customers, such as demands due date, material status, delivery plan, and E&O disposition.

1. OEM/Channel Program manager is responsible for the success of projects.

3. Responsible for program developments, executions, communications, trainings.

6. Hold meetings with cross-functional teams to go over KPI performance, which may include forecast/back order status, material status, On-Time delivery, and Excessive/Obsolete materials.

帳款: 確保客戶依約定回款時間內準時回款

*MAIN TASKS 工作說明

1. 每日安排及規劃好拜訪行程計畫、定期拜訪汽車保養廠等既有客戶，提供專業服務並穩定客戶關係 
2. 開發地區性潛在客戶、拓展品牌市場 
3. 負責訂理國內業務接洽、訂單處理、交期追蹤、達成業績目標 
4. 負責產品報價及產品展示，並處理帳款回收相關事宜
5. 負責業務推展，傳達及說明公司各項業務重大訊息、活動及產品
6. 進行商品行銷，產品特色分析介紹，並提供產品購買的建議
7. 執行推廣公司各項業務行銷活動
8. 提供售後服務，處理客戶端之問題，給予完善的處理
9. 察覺客戶交易之異常狀況，並負責客訴問題之處理
10. 收集市場情報，了解品牌動態
11. 其他主管代辦事項

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
◆Summary
 
Security Analysis Engineer for software development team will be responsible for analyzing cybersecurity threat and risk for different system/software scenario by adopting methodology of SSDLC, BSIMM, Threat Modeling, FIPS 140-3 CMVP or IEC 62443.
The candidate for this job should be capable to evaluate a vulnerability by analyzing product feature, to monitor potential risk for secured development lifecycle management, and to track cybersecurity issue to ensure there is fix or workaround was taken in placed. Therefore, this candidate should have in-depth knowledge to cybersecurity framework such as ISO 27001, SSDLC, BSIMM, , FIPS 140-3 CMVP or IEC 62443; and a good understanding of possible threat and risk for system/software architecture. Ultimately, with overall experience on cybersecurity issue handling to be able to objectively analysis the root cause for preventing potential cyber-attack.
 
 
◆Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
1. Impact analyze for specific system/software or project.
2. Maintain and monitor OSS package built in system/software or project.
3. Tracking potential security issue and vulnerabilities management for system/software or project, and deliver possible solution to reduce security risks
4. Analyze the coverage of security validation for security mitigation.
5. Support SSDLC practice and provide guidance of any tools or practices required to avoid gaps in the development process
6. Maintain records of security analysis on internal platform
7. Drive timely and effective resolution for above security comment.
(For Senior Engineer only)
1. Review security requirement baseline and analyze possible threat model for product prototype.
2. Building up best practices to enable secure software development and meet the requirements from product security validation.
3. Maintain SSDLC best practice and initiate internal training.
major: 資訊工程相關
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
1. Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information technology, or a similar field.
2. In-depth knowledge of applying ISO 27001, IEC 62443-4-1, SSDLC, BSIMM for system/software development, root cause of cybersecurity risk, and vulnerability management.
3. Experience with system/software development project.
4. (Senior Engineer) Experience with methodology of Threat Modeling, Attack tree, OCTAVE analysis based on system/software's DFD or feature spec for at least 3 years.
5. Good Skill in project management and cross-division communication.
6. Capability for drawing system/software diagram.
7. CISSP, CSSLP, SSCP, CEH, CTIA or similar certification is a plus.

【主要工作內容】
- 負責專案前端開發、與後端串接 API
- 開發及維護瑪黑電商官網、供應商、員工內部管理後台
- 協助系統除錯及修正

【能力需求】
- 熟悉使用 JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5 開發網站
- 有 Vue.js 相關開發經驗
- 熟悉 Web API 串接
- 了解 Git 版控
- 良好的團隊合作與溝通能力，具備主動積極解決問題之能力
- 1.5 - 2年以上相關職務工作經驗

【加分條件】
- 有使用 Webpack 優化開發環境
- 有使用 Jest, Jasmine, Mocha ... 相關測試經驗
- 使用 CI/CD 優化部署流程經驗

✤ ​瑪黑家居 工作夥伴福利：
1.良好工作環境與商品福利：
▸ 專案開發獎金制度
▸ 商品優先購買、擁有員工優惠價
▸ 供應每日午餐

2. 人性化休假方式：
▸ 就職第一年即享有七天休假（依到職時間比例計算）
▸ 第二年起再額外增加五天休假
▸ 生日當天放假、每月不扣薪生理假
▸ 不定期員工聚餐／員工旅遊

3. 非福利但必要：
▸ 勞／健保、員工意外險
▸ 支持多元成家與不同性向

job_name: (Sr.)Signal Integrity Engineer (SI) 訊號完整性工程師-TC220106
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
In recent years, electronic circuits with higher data rate and lower voltage supply have enabled higher performances. However, this trend also causes significant DDR4/5 and PCIE Gen4/5 noise problems.  As a global leader for networking solution innovation, Super Micro Computer's mission is to develop and provide the market with end-to end computing solution and high performance networking products. The candidate will play a key role in the development process of in-house server motherboards, by working collaboratively with cross-functional engineering team as well as outside partners to ensure the robust design of the boards. As a Sr. Signal Integrity Verification Engineer, you are expected to be self-motivated and possess a strong will to do great things, with result-driven mindset to develop the most competitive and endurance board products.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities: 

1. Performing DC IR drop and AC impedance simulation.
2.Improve simulation/validation efficiency and performance by automation.
3.Execute SI/PI/RF/EMI verification for the system requirements.
4.Build up SI/PI simulation and measurement correlation database.
5.Build up design and test capability including design guidance and lab setup.
6.Working with HW teams to optimize high-speed signal.
major: 電機電子工程相關 資訊工程相關
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
1.Experience on using SI design tool such ADS, HFSS, Cadence Sigrity and etc.
2.Strong SI/EMI/EMC /Transmission Line theory and application, modeling, analysis, simulation 
3.More than 2 years experience of SI field.
4.Master's or doctoral degree in EE related field.
5.Knowledge and experience for PCB layout tool.
6.HW board design from schematic to assembled test board.
7.Strong technical problem-solving and analytical skills

job_detail:
Summary:
The Compliance Mgr. will report to the GM of Compliance and will assist in Company’s various compliance initiatives, including the Company’s code of business conduct, the whistleblower hotline, internal investigation activities and communications and training. A successful candidate will bring leading practices from other compliance environments and advocate for how those leading practices could be adapted within the company's compliance environment. 

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
Includes the following essential duties and responsibilities (other duties may also be assigned):
- Assist company-wide employee training on compliance related topics, policies, or procedures
- Assist in advising internal management or business partners on the implementation or operation of compliance programs.

cust_name: 中偉科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【工作內容】
1. 負責公司網路通訊相關系統服務及應用環境之部署、調試、遷移、維護、監控。系統環境包含#Linux #Windows #Vmware #TCP/IP #DHCP #DNS #UDP #SQL
2. 負責分析、優化系統操作，提升系統安全性和應用環境的速度、性能。
3. 負責日常服務器的巡檢，負責軟硬體、系統與網頁應用平台管理，包括狀態監控、升級、故障處理及優化等操作。
4. 負責系統日誌分析、挖掘問題隱患、配合製作相關專案。


【具備條件】
1. 具網路、通訊系統、通訊演算法與軟硬體工程知識背景佳，具備通訊軟硬體相關經驗者尤佳。
2. 具備英文聽說讀寫中等以上能力。。
3. 亦歡迎應屆畢業生及電信、通信、資訊、電機、電子等相關科系應徵，公司安排專人培訓。

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Job Summary:
Supermicro is looking for a highly-experienced, successful and proven Sales Manager to sell Supermicro's broad portfolio of server solutions to large enterprise customers. Sales Manager will possess the expertise in managing end-to-end sales processes involving complex, multi-portfolio, large deals. The ideal sales manager must have a strong, credible and professionals working relationship with C-Level executives at current and past clients, plus the ability to create similar synergies at new accounts.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
Includes the following essential duties and responsibilities (other duties may also be assigned):
• Represent and sell the entire Supermicro portfolio of products and services to large enterprise customers
• Establishes a high level of personal credibility as a trusted advisor to key client executives
• Researches and understands the client's industry. Deeply understands client business strategies and challenges
• Acts as a trusted advisor to client leaders, aggressively shapes deals early in the sales cycle. Advances opportunities that result in profitable revenue growth for Supermicro
• Demonstrates breadth and depth of knowledge in aligning Supermicro capabilities to client business and IT priorities, and positioning relative to competitors
• Builds and executes an Account Business Plan (ABP) that includes both transactional and strategic initiatives to grow Supermicro's presence and share in the account.
• Actively drives ABP results through effective account management and reviews
• Identifies, nurtures, and closes new solution opportunities that result in substantial growth in Super micro share, revenues, and margin
• Meets or exceeds quarterly and annual revenue and margin quotas. Uses margin management techniques
• Typically qualifies and closes large deals of moderate to high complexity and cross-GBU scope
• Works with all levels of decision-makers in the client organization including the CEO
• Participates in account investment decisions in pricing and resources
language: 英文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通
other:
Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience preferably in high tech industry
• Minimum 5 years of direct sales experience selling server and storage to enterprise and fortune-1000 companies preferred
• Strong communication skills across multiple disciplines, cultures and geographies
• Track record of building relationships with senior executives and decision makers
• Demonstrated ability in the following areas: pre-call planning, opportunity qualification and objection handling, call structure and control, time and territory management
• Experience entering, tracking and reporting data on lead activity
• Consistent track record of meeting of exceeding sales target
• Must have Microsoft Excel Knowledge
• Multi-task and time management skills are a must
• Proficient in English and additional language is a huge plus

cust_name: 文曄集團_文曄科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【自我推薦獎金】
即日起至2023/07/31以前，主動應徵<業務工程師菁英培育計畫>、<FAE菁英培育計畫>，錄用並通過試用考核者，即可享有自我推薦獎金新臺幣30,000元!
領取條件如下:
任職滿1年，領新臺幣10,000元
任職滿2.5年，領新臺幣20,000元

【計劃內容】
◆ 培養軟、硬實力
在文曄擔任業務工程師，您可以了解通路商的定位，擴增對半導體產業的廣度 (歐美原廠與客戶端)，並可累積業務技能，如客戶關係建立、價格管理、高端談判技巧和快速應變市場競爭等。
>代理產品線包含ADI,MPS, ON Semi, Renesas, Richtek, ST...等，更多產品線資訊，歡迎參閱文曄官網。
>客戶包含鴻海、和碩、廣達、華碩、緯創、仁寶、Gogoro...等，並將技術應用於5G通訊/伺服器 /車用/醫療/IOT等領域。
◆ 4.5個月職前培訓
以業務工程師的定位為出發點，透過『內、外勤單位的課程輪調訓練+客戶實戰訓練 』，加強對於產業及企業營運流程的知識，更透過Design in方式，參與各大廠產品之研發專案，藉由精實的訓練規劃，讓您在面對業務工程師的工作挑戰時，能夠更快速適應，並且發揮所能。 
◆ 高階主管職涯指引
高階主管為您職涯指引，規劃進階目標與發展，讓您處在有變化與挑戰性的工作環境，未來發展更不受限。
◆ 具市場競爭力的薪資水準
提供具市場競爭力的薪資與完善福利，每年也會依照您的表現績效與市場水準進行薪資調整和職級晉升。

job_detail:
【自我推薦獎金】
即日起至2023/07/31以前，主動應徵<業務工程師菁英培育計畫>、<FAE菁英培育計畫>，錄用並通過試用考核者，即可享有自我推薦獎金新臺幣30,000元!
領取條件如下:
任職滿1年，領新臺幣10,000元
任職滿2.5年，領新臺幣20,000元

【工作內容】
1.	與部門團隊共同為客戶提供最適合的技術解決方案，並與客戶建立良好關係，掌握專案進度並協助開發，讓其產品更具市場競爭優勢 。
2.	與業務及PM團隊合作，提供市場最新的產品規格與應用之相關資訊，協助進行市場分析與產品推廣，並即時解決客戶問題。
3.	負責的產品線將視面談結果安排：Intel, MPS, NXP, ON Semi, Renesas, Richtek, ST...等知名半導體大廠產品。
4.	主要技術應用於：5G通訊/電腦/伺服器 /車用/醫療/工控/IOT等領域。
5.	客戶包含鴻海、和碩、廣達、華碩、緯創、仁寶、研華、Gogoro...等，有機會參與各大廠產品之研發專案。

【計劃內容】
◆ 培養軟、硬實力
在文曄擔任FAE，您可以了解通路商的定位，擴增對半導體產業的廣度，成為具備專業技術，同時熟悉市場趨勢，為客戶及公司創造共同利益的頂尖人才!
◆4週產品線課程訓練
由各產品線負責人，透過深入淺出的方式介紹，讓您一步步了解各產品之市場趨勢及技術應用；更有機會透過內/外部訓練課程與研討會，持續深耕專業技能，並獲得技術交流機會!
◆ 高階主管職涯指引
高階主管為您職涯指引，規劃進階目標與發展，讓您處在有變化與挑戰性的工作環境，未來發展更不受限。
◆ 具市場競爭力的薪資水準
提供具市場競爭力的薪資與完善福利，每年也會依照您的表現績效與市場水準進行薪資調整和職級晉升。

文曄提供足夠的資源培訓菁英，由資深供應鏈管理同仁引領專業知識及技能之訓練，並有e-Learning員工訓練平台供線上進修學習，使你在半導體產業鏈中有良好的舞台發展。歡迎對供應鏈管理(Supply Chain Management SCM)有熱忱的你加入！

【工作內容】
1. 執行採購作業流程(forecast整合,下單,追料)
2. 國內外供應商 (IC 原廠)聯絡窗口
3. 採購對帳及請款
4. 原廠/部門銷售報表
5. 退貨及不良品問題處理

【應徵資格】
1. 大學以上，商管相關科系畢業尤佳。
2. 具1年以上電子業業務助理或採購助理相關經驗尤佳
3. 兩年內英文TOEIC/TOEFL或相關英文檢定成績單/證書者可免測

【文曄簡介】
文曄集團為亞太第2大、全球第4大半導體元件代理商，為台灣的上市公司(股票代碼3036)，營收穩定成長(2019年成長率23%)，並致力於國際化發展，營運據點目前為45個，遍及亞洲主要國家。
我們代理全球超過60家一流半導體原廠，服務優質客戶超過9,000家，所經銷代理的產品線涵蓋主機板、筆記型電腦、通訊網路、影像產品、工業控制、車用電子、物聯網(IoT)、消費電子零件等高科技產品。不僅是代理產品，優質的技術Total Solution及迅速的服務團隊更完整地提供客戶全方位的資訊。

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Job Summary:
Super Micro Computer, Inc. is currently seeking a (Sr.) Cost Analyst who will primarily be responsible for inventory & COST for SMC in Taiwan and overseas subsidiaries to provide the timely and accurate month end closing reports、 daily assignment and support business strategy related to inventory flow, lead project assignments. Good knowledge of U.S. GAAP、TW IFRS as well as organizational and communication skills, and fluent English are required.	

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
*Be responsible for month-end closing with deadline in inventory related matter, including Rebate、E&O 、Warranty etc.
*Prepare inventory & COGS report and variance analysis.
*Ensure inventory accuracy and prepare inventory reconciliations if any
* Process cost accounting related matter：goods receipt and debit note, and other inventory movements or adjustments.
*Be responsible for Inventory physical count process
*Lead project assignments, new reporting requirement, support operating objectives etc.
*Comply with local statuary、Internal & External audit and requirement for the assigned entities, be the contact window for the requirement.
*Ad-hoc requests assigned


Qualifications:
*Bachelor degree or above in accounting or finance. 
*At least 5 years relevant accounting experience 
*Experienced with more than 3 years working in Public manufacturing industry is preferred
*Big 4 Accounting Firm experience is preferred
*Good knowledge of U.S. GAAP, IFRS.
*Able to prepare presentation and attend business meeting in fluent English, be thoughtful in communication, strong attention to detail, goal oriented.  
*Ability to work under time pressure and deadlines.
*Familiar with SAP is a plus.

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
This role will report to the Internal Audit Senior Director and will be responsible for the conduct of Internal Audit activities in Supermicro’s International locations, including its Taiwan and Netherlands operations.  The role will be based in Supermicro’s office in Zhonghe Supermicro’s office in New Taipei City.

This global position is responsible for ensuring the accurate recording of all business transactions related to products, services and promotions in accordance with US GAAP. This person will have an extensive US GAAP technical accounting background in a multi-element environment and have a proven ability to foster proactive working relationships with cross-functional and global organizations. Will provide leadership of the assessment of inventory valuation, revenue recognition and various accounting policies and procedures on a global basis. Will assist in a broad range of Company's various internal audit activities, including but not limited to the Company's policy enforcement, develop and carryout the process of obtaining, organizing, and delivering data requests and analytics for various Internal Audit projects, and assessments of financial reporting risk in connection with SOX 404 compliance. The ideal candidate must have solid interpersonal skills to work effectively with Accounting and Finance and the related departments.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
The responsibilities will include, but not limited to:
•	Managing, developing and instructing internal audit staff
•	Ongoing assessment of purchasing rebate accounting process during the month, quarter and year-end closing process to ensure validity and accuracy
•	Evaluate inventory aging and conduct ongoing audit testing to assess excess and obsolete inventory
•	Evaluate and optimize control testing in connection with monthly accruals
•	Collect and analyze operations data by using SAP and internal business application systems and dashboards to develop reports and recommendations for management review
•	Experience with large ERP systems (SAP), and SAP BI experience a plus and related data across a global business footprint
•	Assist with the identification and oversight of enterprise risks impacting international operations and operational risks associated with hardware production and service
•	Conduct oversight of internal governance programs and business processes designed to manage third-party risks, as needed, manage independent audits of key suppliers or distributors based in International locations
•	Manage local testing of global programs such as SOX, fraud, and other compliance programs
•	Assist with the development of current-state business process flows to facilitate Management’s understanding of potential business process improvement opportunities
•	Flexibility to conduct virtual meetings that accommodate for time zone differences
•	Some travel may be required

job_name: GPGM - 影像副導演 Assistant Video Director
cust_name: ViewSonic Corporation_優派國際股份有限公司
job_detail:
You'll work closely with the video director/ executive producer to support them with all aspects of organizing and managing the creative and technical side. Starting from storyboard and mood board creation to overseeing the video quality and production schedule. The type of video includes short advertisements, products, branding images, manifestos, social videos, etc. The treatment of these videos is not limited by live action or animation.

協助導演/監製完成影片製作，從分鏡腳本製作、情緒版創建、拍攝計畫(鏡頭列表)、組織管理拍攝中的團隊成員，到每個影片節點的進度掌控與品質監督。
影片內容包括: 產品短片廣告、產品解說、品牌形象、社群 影片等，製作類型涵蓋實拍及動畫。 

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:

•	Tracking production progress against the entire schedule.
•	Taking into account the creative and video director's ideas and the budget.
•	Coordinating with all stakeholders or vendors in your projects.
•	Working with the director to break down each scene to determine what is needed to execute on that scene. 
•	Creating storyboards and shot lists.
•	Planning and producing the video shooting call sheet (schedule).
•	Managing the crew during filming.
•	Overseeing the hiring of locations, props, and equipment.
skill: 各式影片剪接後製作業, 執行影片拍攝作業, 執行攝影作業, 操作使用各式相機及週邊設備功能, 視覺設計相關知識, 電腦排版設計, 多媒體影像處理, 數位攝影技巧
other:
You will need:
•	Good eyes and well taste to maintain the quality of video tone and manner. 
•	Familiarizing the whole working process with real shooting, animation and post-production.
•	Proactive and team player attitude. 
•	Good communication, problem-solving ability, and open-mindedness about suggestions. 
•	Excellent organizational and planning skills.

•	良好的溝通技巧與美感以及對建議的開放態度，最重要的是，提出對問題的解決能力。
•	熟悉實拍及後製、動畫等製作流程。

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
Super Micro Computer, Inc. is currently seeking an Cost control member who is energetic and detail-oriented to support our fast growing organization. This role will be a member of the Operation department located in Taiwan. The responsibilities of the cost control are included but not limited to manage business cost /price and tracking projects status on a daily basis. The individual works closely with our sales, buyers and PM departments to ensure that the quotation documents are processed and delivered on time. Taking the initiative and the ability to anticipate problems before they happen are also essential for success in this position. The candidate must work well with a team of people who are committed to continuing the company's high growth rate


Job duties: 
1. Managing cost review, margin analysis, and price justification throughout standard quotation process. 2. Price list maintenance. 
3. Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) and customized product price management. 


Essential Duties and Responsibilities: 
1.Cost Review 
1.1. Request component costs from Purchasers. 
1.2. Cross-check the costs with existing items, and/or compare with cost history. 
1.3. Reveal quotation discrepancy, calculate and summarize. 
1.4. Review and ensure the consistency of cost and Bill of Materials (BOM). 
1.5. When costs quotations are not reasonable or discrepancy occurs, Cost Control Team Member shall reject the quotation and provide the feedbacks to Purchaser to renegotiate with vendors. 
1.6. For Server and Chassis, generate product cost based on Design Center BOM. 
1.7. Review costs with Purchaser and update the current costs periodically.


Qualifications:
1. College or above 
2. Minimum 5+ years of experience in a job in the PC/Server market 
3. Fluent in speaking and writing English 
4. Good working attitude, strong execution, and self-motivated 
5. Good at communication and interpersonal skill 
6. Proactive, detail oriented, independent and organized 
7. Able to work under high pressure and solve the critical issues.
language: 英文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
<工作地點可安排於 中和or八德>

<About Supermicro>
Supermicro® is a Top Tier provider of advanced server, storage, and networking solutions for Data Center, Cloud Computing, Enterprise IT, Hadoop/ Big Data, Hyperscale, HPC and IoT/Embedded customers worldwide. We are the #5 fastest growing company among the Silicon Valley Top 50 technology firms. Our unprecedented global expansion has provided us with the opportunity to offer a large number of new positions to the technology community. We seek talented, passionate, and committed engineers, technologists, and business leaders to join us.

<Summary>
1. In depth knowledge in TCP/IP protocols, VLan, Routing and VPN.
    深度了解TCP/IP通訊協定，路由，VPN及 VLan.
2. In depth knowledge in config Layer7 firewall policy (PaloAlto Networks, FortiGate, CheckPoints) and HA config.
    深度了解Layer7 防火牆設定及HA設定
3. Familiar with config switches ( Aruba Networks, FortiNet, Cisco), and HA config.
    熟悉設定Switch及HA設定
4. Familiar and manage with enterprise WiFi solutions (Aruba Networks, Cisco)
    熟悉並管理企業級無線網路產品
5. English - able to talk with device manufacturer's support engineer or talk with non Chinese employees when troubleshooting network issues.
    英語-能夠與國外原廠工程師溝通，或在故障排除時與非講中文同仁溝通
<Essential Duties And Responsibilities>
1. Lead TW network team and provide tech skill guideance to team members.
    領導台灣網管團隊並提供同隊成員技術指導
2. Follow HQ's networking guideline to implement local network projects and manage/monitor TW networks, including the connections to other offices or CM in China, Japan, Korea. 
     依據總公司網路管理方針完成台灣地區的網路項目，管理及監控台灣分公司網路環境，包括與其他分公司的網路連線
3. Manage, enhance and maintain to TW network security.
    管理，增強及維護台灣分公司的網路安全

<Qualifications>
1. 5 years experience in cooperate networking field. 
    五年企業級網路管理經驗
2. 3 years experience in team leader or manager position.
    三年帶領團隊或管理職位經驗
3. CCNA or CCNE certificate preferred but not must
    有CCNA 或 CCNE 證照，但非必要

job_name: Data Center Energy-Saving Total Solution Manager數據中心節能方案經理-TC220343
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
We are looking for an experienced energy-efficient data center solution manager to lead engineers and suppliers to launch the most energy-efficient data center solutions with our customers. 
Using our computing infrastructure ensures the highest energy efficiency and reliability of our servers from the system level (server and IT equipment design requirements) to the infrastructure level (mechanical cooling, power distribution and connectivity options).
Candidates must have in-depth experience with multiple data center design and build projects. Strong knowledge of Data Center temperature distribution is required.


Essential Duties and Responsibilities:

1. Manage consultants to implement the project design through 
    concept, construction documents, and construction  
2. HVAC, and Plumbing systems. Knows design, select, 
    coordinate, and review of the following:
    a) Hydronic flow diagrams and riser diagrams
    b) Air flow and room-to-room pressurization diagrams
    c) Chillers, heat exchangers, cooling towers and associated 
       central plant equipment 
    d) Air handlers, exhaust fans, air valves and diffusers
    e) Air compressors, vacuum pumps, clean steam generators, 
        valves and regulators, plumbing fixtures, and process 
        coolers.

3. Focus on designing HVAC, central plant mechanical and energy 
    management controls systems 
4. Coordinate with architectural, electrical, process piping and 
    structural disciplines 
5. Conduct field surveys of existing conditions and on-site 
   construction progress punch list reviews
6. Design & provide technical advices/support to sales/service 
    partners/direct customers
7. Prepare and review construction packages, requests for 
    information, change orders and other similar tasks during the 
    construction phase of the project
8. Being a global team, working cross functionally across the 
    business and with suppliers
9. Support the career growth of your team members and holding 
    them accountable for success
major: 工業技藝及機械學科類 工程學科類 建築及都市規劃學科類
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
1) 5-10 years related drafting experience or equivalent combination of education and experience of data center, clean room and large scale facility layout

2) Bachelor's or master degree preferably in Mechanical engineering, Refrigeration , Air-Conditioning and Energy Engineering and Thermal related

job_name: 行為學分析師(行為科學家)
cust_name: 東森購物_電視購物_東森得易購股份有限公司
job_detail:
透過各種客戶行為資料，利用機器學習 (Machine Learning) 和統計模型 (Statistical Modeling) 從海量數據 (Big Data) 中挖掘各式使用者行為和能付諸行動的洞見與觀察 (Actionable Insights)，協助集團相關業務單位數據應用建議，將其應用在電商/購物平台通路業績成長、O2O 等各種領域。
1.建立、分析現有客戶資料，並提出數據洞察與行銷建議。 
2.透過資料探勘(Data mining)與大數據(Big data)進行客戶行為分析，建立預測模型找出精準客群，提升行銷成效。 
3.利用各項分析數據指標，提供事業單位營運上觀察與建議。 
4.跨部門溝通協調。
5.對機器學習、深度學習、人工智慧有興趣且具高度開發興趣為佳。

2.熟悉機器學習演算法，並具備程式撰寫能力(R或Python)。
3.具備資料視覺化呈現能力。
4.思考邏輯清晰、具備良好溝通能力與簡報技巧。

無經驗可，完整教育訓練+實境課程，讓家事馬上上手！

1.彈性排班:

2.高額激勵獎金制度 :
【時薪最高320】高時薪之外，還有額外獎金：揪親友一起工作，還有介紹獎金1000元。
【假日時薪另加40元】

4.服務品質最佳 :經客戶回饋五星評價，成為令人尊重且需要的檸檬家事達人。

◆工作地點：台北市、新北市捷運週邊
◆工作內容 : 到府服務，居家清潔
◆新進人員教育訓練

清潔服務或許不會是你工作的首選，大家對於居家清潔持有傳統印象，認為簡單擦過、抹過即可；許多人投入之後便會發現，與想像中有落差，這工作比自已在家做家事還需更仔細，更專業，能學到一技之長，根據經驗，了解不同材質、污垢的清潔方式，也可以看到客戶滿意的笑容，有成就感的工作。


若你對檸檬有興趣，歡迎投遞履歷，我們會盡快與你聯繫

◆不接受與其他同業有承攬或雇傭之關係。

job_name: Sr. Credit Analyst 資深信用分析師(中和)-TC220366
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Job Summary:
Super Micro Computer, Inc is currently seeking a Sr. Credit Analyst who joins our team of valuation professionals who brings industry experience, innovation, and specialized knowledge to help make the best decision for our business and mission. If you are seeking a role that offers you the opportunity to create value and minimize risk while allowing you to develop personally and professionally, consider a career at Supermicro. The Senior Credit Analyst is involved with the daily credit risk optimization requirements and monitor credit exposure. A successful individual for this role must have strong written and verbal communication skills, strong analytical and critical thinking skills, the ability to manage multiple priorities and understand risk and reward relationships. This individual will focus on providing a high level of customer focus and value creation for our business.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
The Sr. Credit Analyst job responsibilities will include, but not limited to:

• Manage the customer credit risk assessment and assignment of credit terms and conditions, monitor credit exposure and performance of trade customers in order to facilitate proactive management of risks, and negotiate credit terms and conditions when customers are unable to meet established guidelines
• Manage the review and update of global credit and collection policies, practices, procedures, and systems
• Review and adjust credit lines of customers on a regular basis or when requested for existing accounts and will revoke lines of credit upon receipt of external information pertinent to financial strength of accounts
• Primary contact for third party credit services (DNB, AR Credit Insurance, etc.)
• Assist on special projects as needed

Qualifications:

• Bachelor Degree (B.S/B.A) or Equivalent experience preferred 
• 6+ years in high-tech corporate credit, problem solving experiences with understanding of financial statement, credit risk analysis, credit practices and procedures preferred 
• Excellent analytical and organizational skills with focus to detail
• Strong communication skills with an ability to work well with all levels of management of personnel
• Ability to organize and prioritize workload and meet deadlines
• Must be flexible and possess the ability to adapt to change
• Microsoft office advanced level capabilities
language: 英文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
[Summary] 
Our Sr. Financial Analyst will primarily be responsible to manage the finance and accounting for SMC in Taiwan and overseas subsidiaries to provide the timely and accurate month end closing, financial reporting and daily assignment. Furthermore, he or she is capable lead a project related to finance and accounting under limited instructions to support business strategy.   And he or she is able to present the financial information in fluent English. The ideal candidate will be a hands-on team player possessing solid organizational and communication skills.

[Essential Duties and Responsibilities] 
The responsibilities will include, but not limited to:
1. Lead Finance & Accounting project assignments, for instance new overseas entity setup, new reporting requirement, strategic and management discussions, assess operating objectives etc. 
2. Manage the outsourcing accounting and finance services operation and related accounting policies.
3. Be the business partner for the assigned entity 
4. Be the contact window of local statuary requirement for annual audit
5. Comply with Internal & External audit for the assigned entities
6. Ad-hoc requests assigned

[Qualifications] 
1. Bachelor degree or above in Accounting or Business related
2. At least 7 years relevant accounting experience 
3. Be familiar with SAP ERP related to Finance and Accounting
4. Good knowledge of U.S. GAAP, IFRS, and TW EAS. 
5. Able to prepare financial narrative, deliver presentation and attend business meeting in fluent English
6. Disciplined and self-motivated, enthusiastic in problem solving even under time pressure 
7. Thoughtful in communication, pleasant interpersonal skill
8. Attention on details and knowledge behind the numbers

1. We demand senior staffs to develop liquid cooling thermal 
    solutions
a) Water direct cold plate liquid cooling solutions. Cold plate, 
    CDM, CDU
b) Rack level liquid cooling solution integration, optimize overall 
    performance
c) Ensure mass production quality and efficient productivity
2.To provide overall liquid cooling solutions from single server to

job_detail:
【SINOX 競泰】
成立40多年，為全球最大的安全鎖研發設計/製造商之一，
有「鎖王」之稱，全球各地擁有上千家客戶，旗下號碼鎖為世界第一，
創新是我們的核心理念，研發設計不斷與時俱進，跨足新領域，已開發出上千種鎖、500多項專利。產品類別：箱包旅配、電腦週邊、智慧電子鎖、戶外運動、居家五金、櫥櫃抽屜...等各種防護安全產品。

＞新客戶開發及舊客戶關係維護。

＞國內外參展規劃及執行。
＞其他主管交辦事項。

【專業技能/產業經歷】
＞具獨立拓展國外業務開發經驗。
＞具市場敏銳度，主動開發新市場。
＞具 ODM / OEM 產品開發經驗 & 熟悉工廠製程者佳。
＞熟悉國際貿易及進出口流程。
＞日文能力精通。

*Bachelor degree in accounting or finance.

*Experienced with more than 2 years working in Public manufacturing industry is preferred
*Big 4 Accounting Firm experience is preferred
*Proactive, detail oriented, organized, willing to work with deadline.
*Fluent in writing and speaking English.
*Ability to work under time pressure and deadlines.
*Familiar with SAP is a plus.

job_name: 【可研發替代役】(Sr.) Firmware Engineer 資深/韌體工程師-TC220024
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
Come and join us! Supermicro is seeking highly qualified candidates as a Legacy BMC or OpenBMC (Sr.)Firmware Engineer. 
This position will be responsible for working with engineering teams to maintain, develop and design BMC Firmware for motherboards, systems, and other server components; discover and resolve hardware and software issues collaboratively and new features. 

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:

歡迎對電商有興趣的您加入我們的團隊！擁有全台最大汽車百貨商品！並與各大網路購物平台合作！

【工作內容】
1. 經營操作電子商務平台，平台管理與促銷活動規劃提報執行、平台PM業務聯繫、曝光資源爭取。
2. 規劃執行行銷活動等EDM或BANNER，提高公司品牌曝光度並刺激銷售。
3. 虛實通路開發業務拓展，各通路業績設定、數據分析及檢討，負責業績成效及提升。
4. 活動商品評估、行銷及成效追蹤，產品資訊蒐集整理與分析。
5. 與後勤協作進行商品、客服、訂單管理協作維護。
6. 定期與主管做績效檢討，回報客戶問題與進度、找出解決方法並執行。
7. 其他主管交辦事項。
other:
1. 需具電商平台操作經驗者。
2. 具零售、網路平台或業務推廣1年以上相關經驗。
3. 具有檔期活動規畫能力，擅長產品銷售及活動策略操作，能跨部門溝通協調共同執行。
4. 熟悉Office電腦文書處理操作，擅長EXCEL（樞紐分析、Vlookup等）。
5. 細心、認真，對自己的工作負責任。
6. 抗壓力高、有使命感並能獨立思考者。

★ 薪資底薪：27000-31000元
★ 全勤獎金：2000元 
★ 年終獎金：保障１個月基本薪資
★ 其它獎金：端午禮券、中秋禮券、生日禮券
★ 員工旅遊：旅遊津貼補助
★ 員購優惠：6 折優惠
★ 員工健檢：每年 1 次

--公司簡介--
★ 公司名稱：荃贏全美密碼有限公司
★ 公司網址：https://www.allwealth.com.tw/
★ 粉絲專頁：https://www.facebook.com/allwealth.tw
★ 上班時段：週㇐～週五／白天／08:30~17:30
★ 休假時段：週休二日／按國定假日休

荃贏全美成立於2014年，目前是全台唯一專注於腸道健康的保健品牌，提供腸道保健完整解決方案，致力於守護國人的腸道健康。
８年來秉持著「有效有體感」， 「天然無藥更健康」 ， 「平價親民」的三大原則 ，陸續推出【膳食纖維】【益生菌】【酵素】等腸道相關保健食品，之中的神纖子系列及獨家配方，解決無數人排便困擾。

荃贏全美在疫情當下成績不降反增，會員人數突破10萬人，粉絲專頁超過6萬人追蹤，google商家網友使用好評超過900則，FB用戶好評超過3000則，數十位網紅愛用推薦，並且在2022年google腸道保健食品關鍵字搜尋第一。

cust_name: 積大企業有限公司
job_detail:
【工作內容】​ 

例行性工作：
1. 透過陌生電訪開發客戶，拓展市場，以達成業績目標。
2. 負責蒐集分析市場資訊、客戶與產品之相關情報，以及競爭者的分析。
3. 負責客戶的商機管理，並與業務協調配合及支援相關產品推廣。
4. 定期電話訪問客戶，維繫穩定客戶關係。
5. 完成主管交辦事項

【職位注重】
1. 禮貌、具親和力、富有溝通協調能力。
2. 需有耐心、細心、良好的態度，並有意願高度學習者。
3. 重視團隊精神，並能獨立作業者。

【加分項目】
1. 曾從事並勝任電子業業務助理者。

【電子零件銷售部介紹】
1.本公司於76年11月成立，超過25年以電子零件銷售為主，在這塊領域我們已有35年的經驗。
2.電子零件銷售部獨立在中和，是由一個5人左右的小團隊負責，在這裡最重視團隊合作與責任心，每位員工都會接觸並參與一間公司是如何維持客戶關係、商品採購、訂單管理與包裝出貨。

【電子零件銷售部福利介紹，詳細如下】
◆ 公司制度和福利
1.節慶獎金/禮品
2.開工紅包
3.年終獎金
4.完整的教育訓練

◆ 請/休假制度
1. 依勞基法所規範之法定假
2. 週休二日
3. 特休/年假
4. 生理假

◆ 員工保險類
1. 勞工保險
2. 全民健康保險
3. 勞退金提撥

◆ 額外福利
1.每月定期員工聚餐
2.每月定期下午茶
3.公司員工提供停車位或停車補助
4.公司員工健康檢查

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
工作地點:桃園市八德區 或 新北市中和

-伺服器測試自動化解決方案
工作內容
1. 研究工業自動化相關技術，達成高階電腦主機板產品之測試與驗證‧
2. 建置與維護自動化測試系統
* 用 Robot Framework實作 test automation
* 監測 CI 自動化測試結果，根據錯誤分析的結果回報錯誤或持續改善 test code
* 混用各種測試工具與程式語言實作 keywords
* 程式語言以 Python, C 為主，script 為輔
3. 在Windows與Linux上設計開發應用軟體，強化驗證技術與效率‧
4. 整合樹莓派(Raspberry PI)追求無人化作業程序‧
5. 與其他部門的RD進行合作溝通，以完成問題釐清與分析‧

-全端網頁開發工程師
工作內容
1. 利用PHP與MySQL進行網站開發
2. 部份功能需搭配CSS, Javascript, jQuery, AJAX ..
3. 負責提供對外介面開發及撰寫相關技術文件。
4. 與自動化測試團隊分工合作，協同執行專案
5. 參與系統基礎建設、CI/CD流程建置、開發、測試、生產環境的建置 
6. 開發與維運伺服器基礎設施、建置可擴展性的架構來運行服務 
7. 支持軟體的快速疊代包括部署、變更、 發布、故障處理等

- Ensure all work meets the guidelines & standards defined for the team and the company
- Identify and resolve errors in work

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary: 
Supermicro is seeking a Product Manager to use strong technical and communication skills towards product definition strategy for Supermicro's core product family including research into vertical-based customer solutions and creation of aggressive go-to market plan. Ultimately, Product Manager will become a core member of Motherboard Product Management team and engage in technical, product development, marketing, and pre/post-sales support activities.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities: 
- Manage products through their entire lifecycle until product EOL including feedback to R&D on product technical detail.
- Review R&D design discussions based on technical background in board design and platform interface specifications.
- Perform in-depth research into customer applications and feedback to engineering teams on how to optimize products
- Create product roadmaps and develop strategy for successful product deployment based on deep understanding of customer requirements
- Coordinate operational activities from product kick-off to product launch. Ensure TTM launches with strong project management skills
- Drive product quality improvement during design and manufacturing stages
- Create positioning statements, marketing, and sales training materials, product specifications
- Present training material to internal sales force as well as externally at customer sites. Willingness to travel periodically to visit customers and attend trade shows
- Conduct competitive analysis and develop ecosystem with partners in the industry
- Drive technical issues to closure by arranging resources and engaging with other engineering team to duplicate and debug
- Serve as third level technical support and provide pre/post-sales support. Manager critical support situations
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
- BS
- 3+ years Engineering experience, preferably in board or chip design 
- Proven track record of successfully taking new hardware technology to market
- Proven track record of fruitful business development activities for products under stewardship
- Strong initiative and ability to work in a self-directed environment
- Demonstrate strong organizational and planning skills
- Demonstrate understanding or how to successfully work in cross-functional organizations
- Creativity to develop new strategies and solutions
- Ability to lead extended teams and meet deadlines
- Strong understanding of market trends and customer needs
- Strong analytical and problem solving skills, strong communication skills (written, verbal, and presentation skills), and ability to negotiate effectively
- Excellent knowledge of server systems, PC systems, and computer peripherals is required

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
<Summary>
We are looking for an information security engineer to help build an information security management system to protect our information assets, thereby increasing customer/ stakeholder trust and organizational reputation. He or she will be responsible for developing and implementing strategies to protect our data and systems from cyber-attacks, as well as working with other departments to ensure that all employees understand and follow best practices for information security, and by acquiring ISO27001, and related security certifications to ensure effectiveness and compliance.

<Essential Duties and Responsibilities>
	Understand and adhere to all information security policies, procedures, and practices
	Maintain up-to-date knowledge of threats, vulnerabilities, and mitigation techniques
	Developing and implementing security policies, procedures, and controls
	Conduct risk assessments and audits to identify potential security issues
	Monitor compliance with security policies and procedures
	Investigate security breaches and incidents
	Coordinate incident response activities
	Prepare reports on security status and risks
	Train and educate employees on security awareness
	Assist in the development and maintenance of business continuity plans
	Manage security vendors and service providers
	Stay abreast of new security technologies and trends


<Qualifications>
＊Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field
＊5+ years experience in IT security, including 2+ years in a management role
＊Strong leadership, interpersonal, and communication skills
＊ISO27001, CISSP, CISM, GIAC, SANS, or similar certification
＊In-depth knowledge of information security principles and best practices
＊Experience developing and implementing information security management system
＊Experience with security compliance standards, such as ISO27001

cust_name: 英特內軟體股份有限公司
job_detail:
英特內軟體現有主力產品為人力資源管理系統及Java軟體技術開發，在這兩個領域中都是台灣本土廠商首屈一指的公司。我們目前正積極研發：具AI特性的新世代人力資源產品、低程式碼線上表單開發平台及其他前沿產品，希望對新技術應用至商業軟體具有熱誠的夥伴加入。

1.	帶領研發團隊：偕同成員新產品開發，流程規劃與設計。
2.	負責iOS或Android平台上進行需求開發整合、測試與修改。
3.	與團隊一同研究引進新技術，發展新產品，實現公司的目標。
4.	我們有不同的任務編組，負責產品開發、客戶服務、APP開發及人工智慧技術開發。
5.	具備與Java或Python(任一)等異質系統研究整合經驗為佳，具開發整合經驗。
6.	項目生命週期管理、專案管理，能主導新產品開發，對創新有想法、理念。
7.	擔任過管理職位者佳。
8.	完成主管交辦事項。

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
Responsible for the DC to DC power circuit design throughout the development process including schematic design, layout, EVT/DVT/PVT builds, validation, optimization, debugging for DC to DC power related circuits, and maintain the products until EOL. As your career progresses, you will have the opportunity to work closely with validation engineers, and other hardware design engineers. We are looking for a self-starter, motivated and talented engineer who have a passion for hardware design and engineering. So we expect you to amaze us with your ample knowledge of DC to DC power designs for servers.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for schematics capture, layout check, BOM creation, and debugging and testing of power portion on motherboard/add-on card/ backplane products
2. Collaborate with layout engineers, validation engineers, firmware engineers, product engineers and other teams to discover and solve any engineering issues in early stage to ensure and enhance the quality of the products
3. Familiar Intel and AMD platform power delivery design
4. Create fluent technical documentation including power specifications, power components placement, layout instructions, test procedures, etc
5. Resolve complicated issues and work on critical engineering problems
6. Base with multi-phase voltage regulator design knowledge and tuning with digital controller.
6. Transfer products to manufacturing with clear documentation, and help C.M. and technical support to solve problems
7. Project maintenance
major: 電機電子工程相關 光電工程相關 電機電子維護相關
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
1. BSEE or MSEE
2. More than 4 years of experience on on DC to DC converter design, debugging, troubleshooting, and testing
2. Knowledge and experience for motherboard hardware design is a plus
3. 4. Knowledge and experience for EMI and ESD design
5. Self-managed to handle a project 
6. Hardworking and responsible
7. Communication in English and Chinese.

job_detail:
Summary 
Super Micro Computer, Inc. is currently seeking a Sr. Database Administrator who has outstanding database management skills. The Database Administrator is responsible for the implementation, configuration, maintenance, and performance of critical multi-vendor Database systems. This role is also responsible to ensure availability and predictable performance of our production database systems.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
1.規劃資料庫，進行資料庫程式設計開發
2.管理、監控資料庫效能，並適時針對相關參數及SQL進行調校等優化作業

6.熟悉資料庫(MySQL)操作與使用、SQL語法撰寫
7.執行業務系統上線支援，管理資料庫伺服器HA Cluster

cust_name: 蕭中正醫院
job_detail:
1.提供血液透析患者相關照護及護理工作
2.提供充份衛教服務，如水份、鉀離子、磷離子之控制等等
3.提供基本的病患基礎醫藥照顧，測量並且記錄病患的生理狀態等
4.洗腎病人進行靜脈注射、肌肉注射、打點滴，觀察記錄患者給藥之後的狀況並加以回報
5.觀察、記錄並回報病人在接受醫療後狀態的改變，特別是一些不尋常的症狀反應，必要時採取救護措施
6.接聽病患求助電話，並且提供協助。

【蕭中正醫療體系護理部_福利及措施】

※多種獎勵福利不及備載，列舉部分說明，發放時間依公司規定辦理※

※獎勵獎金※
一、病人安全通報獎金：有通報並經病安委員會認定者，每件100元。
二、護理專業考核優異獎金：考核成績為全單位最高分並大於91分以上者，或考核成績進步最多並相較於上一季成績至少進步5分以上者，每次1000元。
三、優良護理人員/照顧服務員：應為正職編制人員，採員工及就醫民眾電子投票：2000元/次。

※證照獎金※
(於證照有效期限內，任職相關單位護理人員，為醫院督導及評鑑所需並通過核定)
一、ICU證照：800元/月
二、ACLS證照：250元/月
三、血液透析護理人員證照：800元/月

※福利措施補助※
一、年資加給：任職滿一年後起算，第二年以500元/月計，最多計算八年。
二、護理資歷認定：須提供資歷證明，最多認至五年，每滿一年加給：醫學中心 700元/月、區域醫院 600元/月、地區醫院(洗腎診所) 500元/月

job_name: 【寵物公園】資深寵物美容師 / 寵物美容師 / 寵物美容室店長 -新北市 中和區 保障38000起薪
cust_name: 萬達寵物事業股份有限公司
job_detail:
▍喜愛毛寶貝、熱愛毛寶貝，沒有毛寶貝就吃不下飯、睡不著覺、人生沒有樂趣的貓奴、狗努、毛爸媽、毛家庭，您還在職涯路上尋尋覓覓，追求自我嗎?
萬達寵物事業股份有限公司，【寵物公園】是全台最知名的寵物連鎖體系集團，目前正大力發展，成為全台最強的寵物生活產業集團。2022年到2025年快速展店中，【我們正在尋找跟我們一起挑戰與改變寵物美容產業的事業夥伴!】，「『您可以在寵物公園~找到自己人生的可能』」。

▍【讓我們用『愛』共同打造更美好的『毛宇宙』】，寵物公園目前正在尋找跟我們一樣熱愛毛寶貝，共同讓產業變更好「傳遞溫暖、守護毛寶貝幸福的您」，打造屬於我們與毛寶貝共同的幸福人生。

▍我們誠心邀請你來了解下列職缺，為自己的人生尋找更多的火花：
㊜零售通路中：最熱心、最熱情、溫暖服務的「寵物美容助理」
㊜寵物產業中：最專業、最暖心、體貼守護的「寵物美容師」
㊜在服務產業中：把一家寵物美容店經營的井井有條、客人滿意度破表的「超級寵物美容長」
㊜在連鎖通路中：想讓寵物美容產業變得更好、具有遠見、數字觀念、跨區跨店經營的領導力的「美容督導」
★歡迎您加入我們，投入寵物美容產業，為毛小孩打造乾淨亮眼新氣象★

▍【工作簡介】
這是一個以服務為核心的工作與產業，會因為工作職務不同而有所差異，但滿滿的【真誠關懷、暖心服務、熱情與愛】是公司內的標準配備。
其他的工作可能包含：
1.提供親切友善的服務：毛孩美容的關心、照顧、諮詢以滿足寵物美容造型、寵物沙龍、寵物SPA、住宿服務…等工作。
2.美容室內外、環境、美容器材設備、美容耗材的維護，讓貴賓們有優質舒適、放鬆滿意的生活消費空間。
3.完成一家店寵物美容運作的日常，如：洗澡、吹整、剪腳指甲、刷牙、耳朵清潔、肛門腺清潔、運用電剪或專業剪刀完成造型修剪…等，美容師以上需具有在指定時間內採純手剪完成指定造型的能力歐。

▍【工作地點、時間】
＊上班地點：我們採區域排班，原則上在編製店上班，但會需要因為友店需要支援而跨店上班。
＊上班時間：每日上班9小時(內含有一小時休息間，原則上每四小時休息30分鐘，休息時間會需要根據美容店工作現場狀況調配歐) 。
＊排班方式：每月排班一次、依據區域內的人力需求安排調度，會有排班規則供遵循，您的意願我們一定會尊重。
＊加班管理：我們希望大家都能夠高效率工作、準時下班，但如果需要加班只要事先知會主管或是被主管拜託幫忙協助工作而致加班，都可以到系統申請加班，依法核發加班費，「多勞多得是我們不變的原則、辛苦也會獲得重視」。

▍【薪資制度】
〘獨一無二的薪資制度〙
＊我們定期進行薪資服務檢核，以零售連鎖業市場的『前25%』為薪酬標準。
＊薪資結構：『超高保障起薪+經營分紅+競賽獎金+專案任務津貼+津貼補助+專案獎金』。
＊任職滿三個月者享年終獎金，依據公司當年度營運及個人績效核發，平均1~1.5個月月薪，績效卓越者最高可以領取到4個月年終獎金。
＊起薪：全省有不同起薪，助理保障起薪28K、美容師保障薪資區間居於30K~34K、美容長保障薪資區間居於35~40K，歡迎與我們了解洽詢。
＊美容有個人點數獎金+團體獎金，績效中等者平均獎金約為3,000~5,000，績效卓越點單月獎金有機會上看6,000~10,000。
＊資深美容師或美容另可享薪資保障方案、保障月薪40K~45K。

▍【企業優勢】
★月休8~13天的休假制度(含國定假日全年休假天數平均挪調)。
★完善工作培訓制度及教育訓練規劃給您學習成長的機會。
★新人引導適應：到職有完善的新人課培訓期，有教練進行工作指導與養成，協助適應與上手，階段式人才培育養成。
★寵物員購優惠：商品享有員購優惠、本身是毛家庭一族的您不容錯過!
★晉升管道暢通：每半年固定評估、只要您準備好了，歡迎挑戰職涯晉升與加薪，持續展店~晉升加薪的機會掌握在您手上。
★勇於溝通對話的文化：給予各級人員表達心聲溝通對話的機會，我們未必凡事都能做到盡善盡美，但我們鼓勵溝通與對話，小步快跑，持續優化與進步，變得更好。
★OMO線上線下全方位整合的零售通路，打造專業的寵物管家。

▍【福利】
1.到職滿三個月即享七天特休(採特休預給制)。
2.高績效獎金及年終獎金平均1-1.5個月起(優於同業)。
3.三節獎金及生日禮金。
4.好幾百萬等級的尾牙及聚餐活動獲補助(大獎中獎率達20%、全員通通有獎、通路中最優) 。
5.每月都有教育訓練的課可以上，外面很貴的課，公司開給您，並提供教育訓練補助。
6.免費提供團體保險、為您多一分呵護與保障。
7.任職滿半年、每半年提供兩張電影票或相關休閒補助，工作之餘不忘生活平衡。
8.不定期的訂餐犒賞、飲料及下午茶獎勵。

▍【我們團隊的特色是這樣的】
＊「扁平化的溝通文化」
我們目的都是把事情做好，如果有話想說，就勇敢的說出來！
團隊有著新創的靈魂，樂於嘗試各種不同的挑戰
＊「難題的交流」
你的問題可能就是我的問題，大家集思廣益就沒有問題！
＊「友善的工作團隊」
沒有配備刀械的主管，沒有開著手機發呆同事，沒有裝忙的老闆，更沒有上演八點檔的團隊文化、我們認真執行任務，保持溝通暢通，鼓勵創新與優化。

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary: 
We are seeking a talented Firmware Manager who will be responsible for developing world-class Open BMC Firmware to fully maximize the strong hardware 
Architecture of in-house servers. We are looking for talented individuals who enjoy creating firmware for server products, prototyping concepts, and investigating new technologies. In this position, the candidate will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design robust networking products.

 
Essential duties and Responsibilities:
Includes the following essential duties and Responsibilities (other duties may also be assigned): 
Responsible for porting, defining, developing, testing documenting, and maintaining OpenBMC firmware for server system.
Work closely with software and hardware teams to develop and integrate embedded code in aspeed BMC.
Design and develop new core technologies, participate in new products design 
Dive into and take ownership for critical design issues, work with cross-functional teams for debugging and troubleshooting issues.
Grow up OpenBMC team.

Working location: Bade or Chungho
major: 資訊工程相關 電機電子工程相關
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
Bachelor’s degree in electrical/computer engineer or computer science preferred, MS degree is strongly desirable.   
Minimum of 10 years working experience in firmware development preferred.
Experience in kernel, Driver, Uboot, Redfish, IPMI protocol, ARMs processors, virtual media and web server.
Experience in software or hardware protocol: D-BUS, I2C, PECI, MCTP, PLDM, NVME-MI, NCSI, IPV6, HTTPS…
OpenBMC and BMC preferred.  
Strong programming skills in C+/C++, JavaScripts, with hands-on experience in embedded Linux development.

job_name: Sr. System Engineer 資深系統工程師-TC21805
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
As a global leader in server technologies, Supermicro has been growing extremely fast in many key markets such as Cloud Computing, Big Data, HPC, AI and Storage, etc. To meet the market demand, Supermicro is developing end to end enterprise IT solutions with compute, storage, networking all integrated into full rack or multi-rack level systems. Senior Test Engineer plays an important role in designing, implementing, testing and deploying rack system solutions for data center and enterprise customers.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
1.Perform server and network configurations.
2.Troubleshoot hardware and software issues. Provide fixes in a 
   timely manner.
3.Conduct tests and benchmarks against server hardware,   
   storage, network, applications, HPC and Machine Learning 
   workflows.
4.Collect, visualize, and analyze test and benchmark results
   Write technical documentation including test report and 
   standard operating procedure.
5. Write script to automate tasks including OS and software 
    installation, configuration, and testing.
4.Deploy server cluster solutions including OpenShift, HPC and 
   Deep Learning per customers’ requirements.
major: 數學及電算機科學學科類 工程學科類
other:
1.Working independently under limited supervision and guidance 
   within an aggressive timeline.
2.Strong analytical and problem solving skills.
3.Hands on programming skills in Python and Linux shell scripting 
  languages.
4.Familiar with server, storage, network, and distributed system 
   architecture and technologies.
5.Familiar with Linux and Windows Server operating systems

job_name: Sr. Hardware Engineer 硬體設計工程師-TC21871
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
As a global leader for networking solution innovation, Super Micro Computer's mission is to develop and provide the market with end-to end computing solution and high performance networking products. The candidate will play a key role in the development process of in-house server motherboards, by working collaboratively with cross-functional engineering team as well as outside partners to ensure the robust design of the boards. As a Sr. Hardware Design Engineer, you are expected to be self-motivated and possess a strong will to do great things, with result-driven mindset to develop the most competitive and endurance board products.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
Includes the following essential duties and responsibilities (other duties may also be assigned):
• Responsible for schematics capture, layout checking, BOM generating, and debugging and testing of server motherboards / add-on cards / backplane products
• Collaborate with layout engineers, validation engineers, software engineers, firmware engineers, product engineers and other teams to discover and solve any engineering issues in early stage to ensure and enhance the quality of the products
• Prepare technical documentation including product specifications, layout instructions, test procedures, etc.
• Accomplish the products to conform to engineering specifications, EMC and energy regulations, and customer performance expectations
• Provide the clear documents and strong technical supports to the contract manufacturers and production department during the product sample and production stages
major: 電機電子維護相關
other:
• Master's degree in electrical engineering with 3 years or Bachelor with 5 years of experience working with x86 server / workstation boards is preferred
• Deep understanding of x86 architecture; Comprehensive knowledge on the PCB layout, debugging tools and software, oscilloscope, logic analyzer, etc.
• In-depth knowledge of PCB layout, OrCAD/Allegro tools, circuit design, and PCB structure
• Knowledge of high speed circuit design and voltage regular circuit design
• Familiar with digital scope and high speed bus measurement
• Excellent organizational skills, problem solving capability, and strong ability to adopt and learn new notion and technologies
• Self-motivated and enthusiastic on working in fast-paced environment
